en: And all the trees of the field shall know that I, Jehovah, have brought down the high tree, have exalted the low tree, have dried up the green tree, and have made the dry tree to flourish: I, Jehovah, have spoken and have done it.
hmr: Chun, chu loa thing po pohai chun kei LALPA chun thing insâng chu ka keihnuoi a, thing inhnuoi chu ka suksâng tah, thing hring chu ka sukṭâwl a, thing ṭâwl chu ka suk- hring tah ti hrieng an tih; kei LALPA chun ka hrilin ka thaw tah a nih,” tiin.

en: The word of Jehovah came unto me again, saying,
hmr: LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung nâwk a,

en: What mean ye, that ye use this proverb concerning the land of Israel, saying, The fathers have eaten sour grapes, and the children’s teeth are set on edge?
hmr: “Hi thuvar Israel rama in hmang, ‘Pahai chun grêp thûr an fâk tah a, nauhai hahai chu a ṭim,’ ti hi ieng tinâm a na?

en: As I live, saith the Lord Jehovah, ye shall not have occasion any more to use this proverb in Israel.
hmr: Ka hring zing angin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih; Israel rama chun hi thuvar hi hmangna ding hun hrim nei ta naw ti niu.

en: Behold, all souls are mine; as the soul of the father, so also the soul of the son is mine: the soul that sinneth, it shall die.
hmr: Ngai ta, thlarau po po chu ka ta an na, pa hringna chu ka ta a ni ang bawkin, naupa hringna khawm chu ka ta a nih; thlarau thil suksuol chu thîng a tih.

en: But if a man be just, and do that which is lawful and right,
hmr: Amiruokchu, mi chu a fel a, ân dik le dân anga a thawh a,

en: and hath not eaten upon the mountains, neither hath lifted up his eyes to the idols of the house of Israel, neither hath defiled his neighbor’s wife, neither hath come near to a woman in her impurity,
hmr: tlânghai chunga chun a fâk bawk nawh a, Israel sûngkuohai milimhai tieng chun a mithai ân lên bawk nawh a, a tuolbâwm nuhmei chu a lo sukpawrche nawh a, nuhmei insiehran lai a hung hnai bawk nawh a;

en: and hath not wronged any, but hath restored to the debtor his pledge, hath taken nought by robbery, hath given his bread to the hungry, and hath covered the naked with a garment;
hmr: tukhawm ân suksuoltir nawh a, battu kuoma chun a hnina chu ân hmutir a, thawluinain tukhawm a suksiet nawh a, mi phîngṭâmhai chu bei a lo pêk tah a, saruokhai chu silfên a lo inkhum tah a;

en: he that hath not given forth upon interest, neither hath taken any increase, that hath withdrawn his hand from iniquity, hath executed true justice between man and man,
hmr: a pung hnawt dinga pe suok ngai lo a, a pung khawm la ngai lo a, suolnaa inthawka a kut keitîm a, mi le mi inkâra rorêlna indiktak lo hmang hlak a,

en: hath walked in my statutes, and hath kept mine ordinances, to deal truly; he is just, he shall surely live, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: indiktaka thaw dinga ka rorêlhai zâwm a, ka thuruothai a pawm chun, ama chu mi indik a na, hring ngei ngei a tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

en: If he beget a son that is a robber, a shedder of blood, and that doeth any one of these things,
hmr: Amiruokchu, naupasal a nei a, inru a nih a, thisen insuotu, hieng thilhai a ieng amani hi thawh a,

en: and that doeth not any of those duties, but even hath eaten upon the mountains, and defiled his neighbor’s wife,
hmr: hieng thil thaw dinghai hi thaw lo a, amiruokchu, tlâng chunga lo fa tah a, a tuolbâwmhai nuhmei lo suk- pawrche tah a,

en: hath wronged the poor and needy, hath taken by robbery, hath not restored the pledge, and hath lifted up his eyes to the idols, hath committed abomination,
hmr: mi tlasam le mi rimsihai lo insuksuoltir tah a, thawluinaa lo sukse tah a, hnina lo ngaisak lo a, milimhai tienga a mithai lo inlên tah a, tirdakumnahai lo thaw tah a,

en: hath given forth upon interest, and hath taken increase; shall he then live? he shall not live: he hath done all these abominations; he shall surely die; his blood shall be upon him.
hmr: a pung um dinga lo pe suok tah a, a pung khawm lo la ta hlak chu, ama chu a hring ding am a nih? Ama chu hring naw nih a, hieng tirdak- umnahai po po thawtu hi chu thi ngei ngei a ta, a thisen chu ama chunga chun a um ding a nih.

en: Now, lo, if he beget a son, that seeth all his father’s sins, which he hath done, and feareth, and doeth not such like;
hmr: Chun, ngai ta, ama chun naupasal hung nei ve sien, a pain suolna a thawhai po po chu lo hmu tah a, ama chun ṭih a, chuonga thaw ve lo a,

en: that hath not eaten upon the mountains, neither hath lifted up his eyes to the idols of the house of Israel, hath not defiled his neighbor’s wife,
hmr: tlânghai chunga khawm lo la fa lo a, Israel sûngkaw milimhai tienga a mithai khawm lân lên ngai lo a, a tuolbâwm nuhmei khawm lo la sukpawrche lo a,

en: neither hath wronged any, hath not taken aught to pledge, neither hath taken by robbery, but hath given his bread to the hungry, and hath covered the naked with a garment;
hmr: mi tu chunga khawm lo suksuol ngai lo a, hninaa thutiem la ngai lo a, thawluinaa la sukse ngai lo a, ami- ruokchu, a bei chu tlasamhai kuoma peh a, saruok chu silfêna lo inkhum tah a,

en: that hath withdrawn his hand from the poor, that hath not received interest nor increase, hath executed mine ordinances, hath walked in my statutes; he shall not die for the iniquity of his father, he shall surely live.
hmr: mi rimsihaia inthawka kut lo keitîm tah a, a pung hnawta lo inpûktir lo a, a pung khawm la lo a, ka rorêlnahai lo thaw tah a, ka thuruothai lo zâwm tah; chuong ang mi chu a pa suolna lei chun thi naw nih a, hring ngei ngei a tih.

en: As for his father, because he cruelly oppressed, robbed his brother, and did that which is not good among his people, behold, he shall die in his iniquity.
hmr: A pa chungthua chun, ama chun rilotakin a lo nêksâwr tah a, thaw- luinain a unau chu a lo suksiet tah a, a mihai laia thil ṭha naw chu a lo thaw leiin ngai ta, a suolnaa chun thi ngei a tih.

en: Yet say ye, Wherefore doth not the son bear the iniquity of the father? When the son hath done that which is lawful and right, and hath kept all my statutes, and hath done them, he shall surely live.
hmr: Amiruokchu, nang chun, ieng- dinga naupa chun pa suolna chu a phur nâwm a na? i ti a ni thei a. Naupa chun dân ang le thil indik chu a thaw pha chun, ka thuruothai chu a pawm bawk a, a thaw bawk chun, hring ngei a tih.

en: The soul that sinneth, it shall die: the son shall not bear the iniquity of the father, neither shall the father bear the iniquity of the son; the righteousness of the righteous shall be upon him, and the wickedness of the wicked shall be upon him.
hmr: Mi a suksuoltu chu, chu chu thîng a ta; naupa chun pa suolna chu phur naw nih a, pa khawma naupa suolna chu phur bawk naw ni; mi fel felna chu mi fel chunga chun um a ta, mi rilo rîtlona chu mi rilo chunga bawk chun um a tih.

en: But if the wicked turn from all his sins that he hath committed, and keep all my statutes, and do that which is lawful and right, he shall surely live, he shall not die.
hmr: “Amiruokchu, mi rilo chu a thil suksuolhaia inthawk chun ân her hmang a, ka thuruothai chu a zâwm a, ân dik le dân ang thilhai chu a thaw chun, hring ngei a ta, thi naw nih.

en: None of his transgressions that he hath committed shall be remembered against him: in his righteousness that he hath done he shall live.
hmr: A bawsietnahai po po a ieng khawm chu ama chunga chun hriet zing ni ta naw nih a, chun, a felna a ithaw ngeia chun ama chu hring a tih.

en: Have I any pleasure in the death of the wicked? saith the Lord Jehovah; and not rather that he should return from his way, and live?
hmr: Mi rilo thina chunga hin inhawi tina hrim ka nei am a nih? Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih; a lampuia inthawk chun hung kîr lemin a hring ding a ni naw am a nih?

en: But when the righteous turneth away from his righteousness, and committeth iniquity, and doeth according to all the abominations that the wicked man doeth, shall he live? None of his righteous deeds that he hath done shall be remembered: in his trespass that he hath trespassed, and in his sin that he hath sinned, in them shall he die.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, mi fel chu a felnaa inthawka ân her hmang a, suolna a thaw chun, mi riloin a thaw hlak anga tirdakumnahai po po kha a thaw ve chun, a hring ding am a nih? A thilthaw felhai, a lo thaw tahai a ieng ieng khawm kha hriet zing ni ta naw nih a, a bawsietnaa a bawsietna le, a suolnaa a suksuolna chun, chuongahai chun a thi ngei ding a nih.

en: Yet ye say, The way of the Lord is not equal. Hear now, O house of Israel: Is not my way equal? are not your ways unequal?
hmr: Amiruokchu, Lalpa lampui chu ân ang rawp nawh a, in la ti a ni thei a; tuhin ngai la, Aw Israel sûngkuo, ka lampui chu ân ang vawng an nâwm a nih? In lampuihai ni lo am a ni ân ang vawng naw chu?

en: When the righteous man turneth away from his righteousness, and committeth iniquity, and dieth therein; in his iniquity that he hath done shall he die.
hmr: Mi fel chu a felnaa inthawka ân her hmang a, thil suol a thaw chun thîng a ta, suolna a ithawa chun thîng a tih.

en: Again, when the wicked man turneth away from his wickedness that he hath committed, and doeth that which is lawful and right, he shall save his soul alive.
hmr: Chu nawah, mi rilo chu a rîtlonaa rîtlona a lo thaw tahaia in thawka ân her hmang a, chun, ân dik le dân ang thilhai chu a thaw chun, a thlarau chu hringin sanhim a tih.

en: Because he considereth, and turneth away from all his transgressions that he hath committed, he shall surely live, he shall not die.
hmr: Ama chun a ngaituoh a, a lo thaw tah, a bawsietnahai po poa inthawk chun ân her hmang tâk leiin thi naw nih a, hring ngei ngei a tih.

en: Yet saith the house of Israel, The way of the Lord is not equal. O house of Israel, are not my ways equal? are not your ways unequal?
hmr: Israel sûngkuo chun, Lalpa lampui chu ân ang vawng lêm, an la ti rawp khawm a ni theia, Aw Israel sûngkuo, ka lampuihai chu ân ang vawng a ni naw maw? Nanga lam- puihai lem an nâwm a nih ân ang naw chu?

en: Therefore I will judge you, O house of Israel, every one according to his ways, saith the Lord Jehovah. Return ye, and turn yourselves from all your transgressions; so iniquity shall not be your ruin.
hmr: Chuleiin, Israel sûngkuo, mi tin chu a thilthawhai ang peiin rêlpêk ka tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih. Hung kîr unla, in bawsietnahai po poa inthawkin hung kîr ro; chuongchun, suolna chu in tlûkna lung hung ni naw nih.

en: Cast away from you all your transgressions, wherein ye have transgressed; and make you a new heart and a new spirit: for why will ye die, O house of Israel?
hmr: In bawsietnahai po po, in lo bawsiet tahai chu, nangnia inthawk- in peihâwn unla, thlarau thar le lung- ril thar insiempêk unla, aw Israel sûngkuo, iengdingin am thîng in ta?

en: For I have no pleasure in the death of him that dieth, saith the Lord Jehovah: wherefore turn yourselves, and live.
hmr: Mi thinaa chun lâwmna ka nei si nawh a, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih, chuleiin, hung kîr unla, hring ro,” tiin.

en: Moreover, take thou up a lamentation for the princes of Israel,
hmr: Chu nawa chun Israel lalhai ta ding chun sûnna hla phuok la,

en: and say, What was thy mother? A lioness: she couched among lions, in the midst of the young lions she nourished her whelps.
hmr: I nu chu ieng am a na? Sakeibakneipui a nih, A bawk a, a têhai châwmin, sakeibaknei tuoihai laia chun.

en: And she brought up one of her whelps: he became a young lion, and he learned to catch the prey; he devoured men.
hmr: A têhai pakhat chu a hung châwm tlei a, Sakeibaknei tuoi a hung na, fâkding man ân chûk a; Mihriemhai chu a fâk zo tah a.

en: The nations also heard of him; he was taken in their pit; and they brought him with hooks unto the land of Egypt.
hmr: Hnamhai khawm chun a chanchin an lo hriet a, An khura chun lâkin a um a; Khaidieta khitin Aigupta rama chun an hung ṭhuoi tah a.

en: Now when she saw that she had waited, and her hope was lost, then she took another of her whelps, and made him a young lion.
hmr: A nu chu a nghâk zing a, a beiseina a bo tah ti a hriet a, A te dang a lâk vak a, sakeibaknei tuoiah a siem nâwk a.

en: And he went up and down among the lions; he became a young lion, and he learned to catch the prey; he devoured men.
hmr: Sakeibakneihai lai a suk a tungin ân lawn a, Sakeibakneituoi a hung na, fâkding man an chûk a; Mihriemhai chu a fâk zo tah a.

en: And he knew their palaces, and laid waste their cities; and the land was desolate, and the fulness thereof, because of the noise of his roaring.
hmr: An in ropuihai chu a hriet a, an khawpuihai a suksiet a, Ân rûm ri leiin ram chu râusanin a um a, a bitna lai po po le chun.

en: Then the nations set against him on every side from the provinces; and they spread their net over him; he was taken in their pit.
hmr: Rambunghaia inthawk sîr tinah hnamhaiin ama an hung kal a, A chungah an lênhai an keiphar a, an khura chun a tla tah a.

en: And they put him in a cage with hooks, and brought him to the king of Babylon; they brought him into strongholds, that his voice should no more be heard upon the mountains of Israel.
hmr: Kawl inbunin bâwmah an khum a, Babulon lal kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a; Kul dettak sûngah an ṭhuoi a, A râwlhai chu Israel tlânghaia inthawk hriet a ni nâwk ta nawna dingin.

en: Thy mother was like a vine, in thy blood, planted by the waters: it was fruitful and full of branches by reason of many waters.
hmr: I nu chu i thisena chun tuihai kâwla phun, grêphrui, Tuihai tam leia ra nuomtak le kâua sip ang a nih.

en: And it had strong rods for the sceptres of them that bare rule, and their stature was exalted among the thick boughs, and they were seen in their height with the multitude of their branches.
hmr: A kâu ngartakhai chu rorêltu lalhmawla hmang an hung nih a, A buk samup laia khawm chun an dâwk lûr bik a; Kâu tamtakhai laiah ân sâng leiin an hmu bîk lûr bawk a.

en: But it was plucked up in fury, it was cast down to the ground, and the east wind dried up its fruit: its strong rods were broken off and withered; the fire consumed them.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, lunginsenna hmalthlakin a um a, Hnuoia pei thlâkin a um a, Sak thliin a sukṭâwl a, a ra a mût ṭil a, A kâu ngartak khawm chu suktliek a hung na, A vuoi tah a, meiin a kâng hmang tah a.

en: And now it is planted in the wilderness, in a dry and thirsty land.
hmr: Tuhin chu thlalêrah, Ram ṭâwl le tuihulnaah phunsawn a ni tah.

en: And fire is gone out of the rods of its branches, it hath devoured its fruit, so that there is in it no strong rod to be a sceptre to rule. This is a lamentation, and shall be for a lamentation.
hmr: A kâu kuonghaia inthawk mei a suok a, a ra a kâng hmang zo a, Chuleiin, kâu ngartak rorêlnaa lalhmawla hmang thei khawm a um ta nawh. Hi hi sûnna chu a na, sûnna hla chu la hung nîng a tih.

en: And he said unto me, Son of man, stand upon thy feet, and I will speak with thee.
hmr: Chun, ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, i kehai chun ngîr la, in- biekpui ka ti che,” a mi tih a.

en: And the Spirit entered into me when he spake unto me, and set me upon my feet; and I heard him that spake unto me.
hmr: Chun, ka kuoma thu a hril lai chun thlarau chu ka sûnga chun a hung lût a, ka kehai chun a mîn ngîrtir a; chun, ka kuoma thuhriltu chu ka ngai tah a.

en: And he said unto me, Son of man, I send thee to the children of Israel, to nations that are rebellious, which have rebelled against me: they and their fathers have transgressed against me even unto this very day.
hmr: Ka kuoma chun, “Mihriem naupa, Israel thlahai, hnam helhai, keima chunga helhai kuoma chun tir ka ti che; vawisûn ni chen hin, anni le an thlatuhai khawmin ka chungah an bawsiet a nih.

en: And the children are impudent and stiffhearted: I do send thee unto them; and thou shalt say unto them, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Chu thla chu zakmawtak le lungril ngar an na; an kuoma chun ka tir che a ni hi; chun, an kuoma chun hieng ang hin hril i tih, ‘Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng ang hin a tih,’ tiin.

en: And they, whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear (for they are a rebellious house), yet shall know that there hath been a prophet among them.
hmr: Chun, an lo ngai khawma, an lo ngaisak naw khawmin amanih, anni laia zâwlnei a um ti chu hre chêk an tih, (sûngkaw hel an ni sih a).

en: And thou, son of man, be not afraid of them, neither be afraid of their words, though briers and thorns are with thee, and thou dost dwell among scorpions: be not afraid of their words, nor be dismayed at their looks, though they are a rebellious house.
hmr: Chun, nang mihriem naupa, anni chu ṭi naw la, hlo hlingnei le buorhai i kâwla chun umin, ainuvêt laia chun chêng la khawm, an thuhai chu ṭi chuong bawk naw la; sûngkaw hel hmang ni hai sien khawm an thuhaia chun ṭi naw la, an hmêl enin beidawng bawk naw rawh.

en: And thou shalt speak my words unto them, whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear; for they are most rebellious.
hmr: Chun, an lo ngai khawma, an lo ngaisak naw khawma, an kuoma chun ka thuhai chu hril hrim hrim i ta; hel hmangtak el an ni sih a.

en: But thou, son of man, hear what I say unto thee; be not thou rebellious like that rebellious house: open thy mouth, and eat that which I give thee.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, nang mihriem naupa, i kuoma ka hril chu ngai ta; chu sûngkuo hel hmang ang chun hel hmang ni ve naw la; i bau chu ka la, ka pêk che chu fa rawh,” a ta.

en: And when I looked, behold, a hand was put forth unto me; and, lo, a roll of a book was therein;
hmr: Chun, ka hang en a, ngai ta, keia tieng hin bân hin a mi hei ban a; chun, ngai ta, chutaka chun lekhabu zuol hi a um a;

en: and he spread it before me: and it was written within and without; and there were written therein lamentations, and mourning, and woe.
hmr: ka hmaa chun a hung phar a, a sûngtieng le a puotienga ziek a na; chutaka chun sûnna le, ṭâna le chungrikna ziek a nih.

en: And it came to pass in the seventh year, in the fifth month, the tenth day of the month, that certain of the elders of Israel came to inquire of Jehovah, and sat before me.
hmr: Kum sarina, thla ngânaa, chu thla ni sâwm ni chun, Israel upa ṭhenkhathai chu LALPA kuoma thu indawn dingin an hung a, ka hmaa chun an ṭhung a.

en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuom- ah a hung tlung a,

en: Son of man, speak unto the elders of Israel, and say unto them, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Is it to inquire of me that ye are come? As I live, saith the Lord Jehovah, I will not be inquired of by you.
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, Israel upahai kuoma khan thu hril la, an kuoma chun, ‘Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a ti a nih; ka kuomah thu indawn dinga hung in ni maw? Kei ka hring zing angin nangni thu indawn hin um naw ning,’ Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih,

en: Wilt thou judge them, son of man, wilt thou judge them? Cause them to know the abominations of their fathers;
hmr: Anni chu ro rêlpêk i ti, mihriem naupa, anni chu ro rêlpêk i ti? An thlatuhai tirdakumnahai chu in- hriettir la;

en: and say unto them, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: In the day when I chose Israel, and sware unto the seed of the house of Jacob, and made myself known unto them in the land of Egypt, when I sware unto them, saying, I am Jehovah your God;
hmr: an kuoma chun, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; ‘Israel hi ka thlang a, Jakob sûngkaw thlahai chunga chun ka bân ka phar a, Aigupta ramah anni laia kân suk- hmêlhriet nia chun; ka bân ka phar a, LALPA in Pathien ka nih,’ tiin;

en: in that day I sware unto them, to bring them forth out of the land of Egypt into a land that I had searched out for them, flowing with milk and honey, which is the glory of all lands.
hmr: chu nia chun Aigupta rama in- thawka, ram po pohai ropuina nenetui le khuoizua luong ram an ta dinga ka lo enthlit tah rama hung ṭhuoi dingin, an kuoma chun ka bân ka phar a.

en: And I said unto them, Cast ye away every man the abominations of his eyes, and defile not yourselves with the idols of Egypt; I am Jehovah your God.
hmr: An kuoma khawm chun, a mithmua tirdakumnahai po po chu nangni mi tinin peithla unla, Aigupta ram milimhai chun insukpawrche naw unla; LALPA in Pathien ka ni hi, tiin ka hril a.

en: But they rebelled against me, and would not hearken unto me; they did not every man cast away the abominations of their eyes, neither did they forsake the idols of Egypt. Then I said I would pour out my wrath upon them, to accomplish my anger against them in the midst of the land of Egypt.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, ka chungah an hel a, ka thu an ngai nawh a; mi tin chun an mithmua an tirdakumnahai chu an pei thlâk naw bawk a; Aigupta milimhai khawm chu an nghatsan bawk nawh a; chun, kei chun, ‘an chunga chun Aigupta ram sûnga an chunga ka lungsenna sukpuitling dingin ka lunginsenna chu ka bun- thlâk ding a nih,’ ka tih a;

en: But I wrought for my name’s sake, that it should not be profaned in the sight of the nations, among which they were, in whose sight I made myself known unto them, in bringing them forth out of the land of Egypt.
hmr: nisienlakhawm, ka hming leiin, Aigupta rama inthawk anni hung ṭhuoi suoka an kuoma ka lo intârlang tâkna hmutu, an laia an umna hnam- hai mithmua, hrilsiet ka ni nawna dingin, ka thawh a.

en: So I caused them to go forth out of the land of Egypt, and brought them into the wilderness.
hmr: chuongchun, Aigupta rama inthawka suok dingin ka siem a, thlalêra chun anni chu ka hung ṭhuoi tah a.

en: And I gave them my statutes, and showed them mine ordinances, which if a man do, he shall live in them.
hmr: Ka thuruothai le ka rorêlhai, chuong chu miin an thawh a, an hring pui dinghai chu, an kuomah ka pêk a, kân entir bawk a.

en: Moreover also I gave them my sabbaths, to be a sign between me and them, that they might know that I am Jehovah that sanctifieth them.
hmr: Chu nawa khawm, ka châwlni chu anni le keia kâra inchikna nih a, anni sukthiengtu LALPA chu ka nih ti an hriet theina dingin ka pêk bawk a.

en: But the house of Israel rebelled against me in the wilderness: they walked not in my statutes, and they rejected mine ordinances, which if a man keep, he shall live in them; and my sabbaths they greatly profaned. Then I said I would pour out my wrath upon them in the wilderness, to consume them.
hmr: Amiruokchu, Israel sûngkuo chu thlalêra khan ka chungah an hel a, ka thuruotahai chun an fe nawh a, chuong chu miin a thawa a hringna dinghai ka rorêlhai khawm chu an dang kîr a; ka châwlni khawm chu nasatakin an suksiet a, chun, kei chun thlalêra chun anni chu kâng- hmang dingin ka lunginsenna chu an chungah ka bunthlâk ding a nih ka ti tah a.

en: But I wrought for my name’s sake, that it should not be profaned in the sight of the nations, in whose sight I brought them out.
hmr: Chun, ka hming leiin, hnamhai anni mithmua anni ka hung ṭhuoi- suoknahai, chuonghai mithmua chun hrilsiet a ni ding a ni nawh tiin ka thawh a.

en: Moreover also I sware unto them in the wilderness, that I would not bring them into the land which I had given them, flowing with milk and honey, which is the glory of all lands;
hmr: Chu nawa khawm, ram po pohai ropuina, nênetui le khuoizua luong anni ka lo pêk ta rama chun anni chu ka ṭhuoi lût naw ding a nih tiin thlalêra khan an kuomah ka bân ka lo phar tah a;

en: because they rejected mine ordinances, and walked not in my statutes, and profaned my sabbaths: for their heart went after their idols.
hmr: ka rorêlhai chu an dang kîr a, ka thuruothai chu an hraw nawh a, ka châwlnihai chu an bâwsiet ta leiin; an lungrilhai chun an milimhai chu a zui sih a.

en: Nevertheless mine eye spared them, and I destroyed them not, neither did I make a full end of them in the wilderness.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, anni suksiet- naa inthawk chun ka mit chun a hlah a, thlalêra khan anni chu ka lo suktâwp dêr el bawk nawh a.

en: And I said unto their children in the wilderness, Walk ye not in the statutes of your fathers, neither observe their ordinances, nor defile yourselves with their idols.
hmr: Chun, an thlahai kuomah thla- lêra khan, ‘In thlatuhai thuruothai chu hraw naw unla, an rorêlhai chu pawm bawk naw unla, an milimhai chun nangni le nangni insukpawrche bawk naw ro;

en: I am Jehovah your God: walk in my statutes, and keep mine ordinances, and do them;
hmr: LALPA in Pathien chu kei ka na, ka thuruothai chu hraw unla, ka rorêlhai chu pawm unla, thaw ro;

en: and hallow my sabbaths; and they shall be a sign between me and you, that ye may know that I am Jehovah your God.
hmr: ka châwlni khawm chu inza bawk unla; LALPA in Pathien ka nih ti in hriet theina dingin nangni le keia inkâra inchikna nîng a tih,’ tiin.

en: But the children rebelled against me; they walked not in my statutes, neither kept mine ordinances to do them, which if a man do, he shall live in them; they profaned my sabbaths. Then I said I would pour out my wrath upon them, to accomplish my anger against them in the wilderness.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, chuong thlahai chu ka chungah an hel ta rawp a, ka thuruothai chu an hraw nawh a, ka rorêlhai khawm chu thaw dingin an zâwm bawk nawh a; chuong chu miin a thaw chun chuonga chun hring a tih; ka châwlni khawm an sukpawr- cheh a; chun, kei chun thlalêra an chunga ka lunginsenna chu sukpui- tling dingin an chunga chun ka lunginsenna chu ka bunthlâk ding a nih ka tih a.

en: Nevertheless I withdrew my hand, and wrought for my name’s sake, that it should not be profaned in the sight of the nations, in whose sight I brought them forth.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, an mithmua anni ka hung ṭhuoi suokna hnamhai mithmua chun sukhmingsiet a ni nawna dingin, ka hming leiin ka thawh a, ka kut chu ka keitîm tah a.

en: Moreover I sware unto them in the wilderness, that I would scatter them among the nations, and disperse them through the countries;
hmr: Chu nawa khawm chu ram hran hranhaia chun hnawt dar ka ta, hnamhai laia chun anni chu ka sukdar ding a nih tiin thlalêra khan an kuomah ka bân chu ka phar a;

en: because they had not executed mine ordinances, but had rejected my statutes, and had profaned my sabbaths, and their eyes were after their fathers’ idols.
hmr: ka rorêlhai chu an phursuok nawh a, ka thuruothai khawm an dangkîr bawk leiin le, ka châwlnihai khawm chu an sukpawrcheh a, an thlatuhai milimhai chu an mit chun a en zing leiin.

en: Moreover also I gave them statutes that were not good, and ordinances wherein they should not live;
hmr: Chu nawa khawm chun thuruot a ṭha ni lo, rorêlnahai an hringna ding ni lohai khawm chu ka pêk bawk a;

en: and I polluted them in their own gifts, in that they caused to pass through the fire all that openeth the womb, that I might make them desolate, to the end that they might know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: chun, anni thilpêkhaia ngei, sul hung hawngtu taphawt meia an infethlengtirnaa chun, anni chu râusana ka siem theina ding le, a tâwpa chun LALPA ka nih ti an mi hriet theina dingin anni chu ka sukpawrcheh a.

en: Therefore, son of man, speak unto the house of Israel, and say unto them, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: In this moreover have your fathers blasphemed me, in that they have committed a trespass against me.
hmr: “Chuleiin, mihriem naupa, Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun thu hril la, an kuomah Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng ang hin a tih ti rawh: In thlatuhai chun hitaka hin an mi lo demsiet tah a, ka chunga an lo bâwsietnaa hin.

en: For when I had brought them into the land, which I sware to give unto them, then they saw every high hill, and every thick tree, and they offered there their sacrifices, and there they presented the provocation of their offering; there also they made their sweet savor, and they poured out there their drink-offerings.
hmr: Ka bân phara anni pe dinga ka ti, chu rama anni ka hung ṭhuoi lai chun tlâng insângtak le rampui inthim mup an hmuh a, chutaka chun an inthâwina chu an inhlân tah a, chutaka chun an thilinhlân chimum chu an pêk a, chutaka chun an rim- inhnik khawm chu an bun bawk a.

en: Then I said unto them, What meaneth the high place whereunto ye go? So the name thereof is called Bamah unto this day.
hmr: Chun, keiin an kuomah, ‘In va fena bâwlhmun kha ieng am in tih a?’ ka tih a. Chuongchun, a hminga chun vawisûn ni chen hin Bama an inbûk tah a.

en: Wherefore say unto the house of Israel, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Do ye pollute yourselves after the manner of your fathers? and play ye the harlot after their abominations?
hmr: Chuleiin, Israel sûngkuohai kuoma chun hril la, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: In thlatuhai thaw dân ang bawkin nangni le nangni in insukpawrche ding a ni maw? An tirdakumna chu châkin in zâwm ve ding a ni maw?

en: and when ye offer your gifts, when ye make your sons to pass through the fire, do ye pollute yourselves with all your idols unto this day? and shall I be inquired of by you, O house of Israel? As I live, saith the Lord Jehovah, I will not be inquired of by you;
hmr: In thilpêkhai in inhlân lai le, in naupasalhai chu meia in infethleng- tir lai khan, in milimhaia khan vawi- sûn ni chen hin in insukpawrche a ni nâwm a nih? Aw Israel sûngkuo, nangni mi râwn hin ka um rawp ding maw? Ka hring zing angin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih, nangni irâwn hin chu um ta naw ningah.

en: and that which cometh into your mind shall not be at all, in that ye say, We will be as the nations, as the families of the countries, to serve wood and stone.
hmr: “In lungrila in ingaituo, ‘Thing le lung rawng bâwl dinga rambung- haia sûngkuohai le hnamhai ang nîng ei ta’ in ti ang kha hung ni tawp naw ti niu.

en: As I live, saith the Lord Jehovah, surely with a mighty hand, and with an outstretched arm, and with wrath poured out, will I be king over you.
hmr: “Lalpa PATHIEN chun ka hring zing angin, kut hrâttak le, bân phar le lunginsenna bunthlâkin in chungah lal nîng ka ta,

en: And I will bring you out from the peoples, and will gather you out of the countries wherein ye are scattered, with a mighty hand, and with an outstretched arm, and with wrath poured out;
hmr: hnam danghai laia inthawkin la suok ka ti cheu a, sukdara in umna ramhaia inthawk khan kut tha hrât le, bân phar le lunginsenna bunthla hielin kei khâwm ka ti cheu;

en: and I will bring you into the wilderness of the peoples, and there will I enter into judgment with you face to face.
hmr: chun, hnamhai thlalêra chun hung ṭhuoi ka ti cheu a, chutaka chun hmai san ngeiah phût tâng ka ti cheu.

en: Like as I entered into judgment with your fathers in the wilderness of the land of Egypt, so will I enter into judgment with you, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: In thlatuhai Aigupta ram thla- lêra ka phût ang khan, nangni khawm ka phût ding cheu a nih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

en: And I will cause you to pass under the rod, and I will bring you into the bond of the covenant;
hmr: Chun, vuokfung hnuoiah infetir ka ti cheu a, thuthlung khuokhirna hnuoiah lalût ka ti cheu;

en: and I will purge out from among you the rebels, and them that transgress against me; I will bring them forth out of the land where they sojourn, but they shall not enter into the land of Israel: and ye shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: nangni laia inthawkin mi helhai chu sukfai ka ta, chuong keia chunga bâwsetuhai le chun; an mikhuolna rama inthawk chun hung ṭhuoi suok ka tih; amiruokchu, Israel rama chun chu lût naw ni hai; chun, LALPA chu ka nih, ti mi hre tâng in tih.

en: As for you, O house of Israel, thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Go ye, serve every one his idols, and hereafter also, if ye will not hearken unto me; but my holy name shall ye no more profane with your gifts, and with your idols.
hmr: Nangni ta ding chun, Aw Israel sûngkuo, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Fe unla, ka thu in ngai si naw ding chun mi tinin tuhin le hi hnunga khawm, a milimhai rawng chu va bâwl el raw se chu; amiruokchu, ka hming inthieng chu in thilpêkhai le in milimhai chun sukhmingsie ngai ta naw ti niu.

en: For in my holy mountain, in the mountain of the height of Israel, saith the Lord Jehovah, there shall all the house of Israel, all of them, serve me in the land: there will I accept them, and there will I require your offerings, and the first-fruits of your oblations, with all your holy things.
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih: Ka tlâng inthieng, Israel tlâng insânga chun Israel sûngkuohai po po chu, an rêngin chu rama chun ka rawng bâwl tâng an ta, chutaka chun anni chu lâwm ka ta, chutaka chun in thilin- hlânhai chu, in rahmasa inthâwi- nahai le in thil inthienghai po po le chun pawimawsak tâng ka tih.

en: As a sweet savor will I accept you, when I bring you out from the peoples, and gather you out of the countries wherein ye have been scattered; and I will be sanctified in you in the sight of the nations.
hmr: Hnamhai laia inthawka ka hung ṭhuoi suok pha cheu a, sukdara in umna ramhaia inthawka ka kei khâwm pha cheu chun riminhnik angin lâwm tâng ka ti cheu a, hnam- hai mithmua ngei chun nangni chu sukthieng tâng ka ti cheu.

en: And ye shall know that I am Jehovah, when I shall bring you into the land of Israel, into the country which I sware to give unto your fathers.
hmr: Chun, in thlatuhai kuoma pêk dinga ka bân ka lo phar tah, chu ram, Israel rama chun ka hung ṭhuoi pha cheu chun LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng in ta;

en: And there shall ye remember your ways, and all your doings, wherein ye have polluted yourselves; and ye shall loathe yourselves in your own sight for all your evils that ye have committed.
hmr: chutaka chun, in lampuihai le in thilthawhai po po, in lo insuk- pawrchenahai chu hre zing in tih; chun, in suolnahai po po, in lo suksuol tahaia chun in mithmu ngeia chun nangni le nangni intheida tâng in tih.

en: And ye shall know that I am Jehovah, when I have dealt with you for my name’s sake, not according to your evil ways, nor according to your corrupt doings, O ye house of Israel, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, in lampui suolhai ang ni loa, in thilthaw khawhlohai ang khawm ni loa, ka hming leia nangni le sin ka thaw pha chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng in tih, Aw Israel sûngkuo, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih,” tiin.

en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuom- ah a hung tlung a.

en: Son of man, set thy face toward the south, and drop thy word toward the south, and prophesy against the forest of the field in the South;
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, i hmai kha simtieng innghat la, i thu chu sim- tienga chun inthla la, Sim rama phûl rampui chunga chun thu hril rawh;

en: and say to the forest of the South, Hear the word of Jehovah: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah, Behold, I will kindle a fire in thee, and it shall devour every green tree in thee, and every dry tree: the flaming flame shall not be quenched, and all faces from the south to the north shall be burnt thereby.
hmr: chun, Sim rampui kuoma chun, ‘LALPA thu hi lo ngai la, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a ti a nih: Ngai ta, i sûnga hin mei sêm ka ta, i sûnga thing hring tinrênghai chu kâng hmang a tih, thing ṭâwl tinhai le chun, chun, meichawk lai mei chu rêm el naw nih a, simtienga inthawka hmârtieng pang po po kâng a tih.

en: And all flesh shall see that I, Jehovah, have kindled it; it shall not be quenched.
hmr: Chun, tisa tin chun kei LALPA hin ka sêm a nih ti hmûng an ta; thimit el naw ni,’ ti rawh,” tiin.

en: Then said I, Ah Lord Jehovah! they say of me, Is he not a speaker of parables?
hmr: Chun, kei chun, “E, Lalpa PATHIEN! Ama hi tekhithu hriltu a nih an nâwm a nih? an mi ti el a nih,” ka ta.

en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a,

en: Son of man, set thy face toward Jerusalem, and drop thy word toward the sanctuaries, and prophesy against the land of Israel;
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, i hmai chu Jerusalem tieng innghat la, i thu chu hmun inthieng tieng inthla la, Israel ram chunga chun thu hril rawh;

en: and say to the land of Israel, Thus saith Jehovah: Behold, I am against thee, and will draw forth my sword out of its sheath, and will cut off from thee the righteous and the wicked.
hmr: chun, Israel ram kuoma chun hieng hin hril la, LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta, nang hi ka dodâl cheh a, a bâwma inthawk chun ka kâwlhnâm chu phawi dawk ka ta, nangmaa inthawka mi fel le mi rilohai khawm chu sât thlâng ka tih.

en: Seeing then that I will cut off from thee the righteous and the wicked, therefore shall my sword go forth out of its sheath against all flesh from the south to the north:
hmr: Nangmaa inthawka mi fel le mi rilohai chu ka sât thlâk ding a nih ti hmuin, simtienga inthawka hmâr- tieng chenin, ka kâwlhnâm chu tisa po po chu doin a bâwma inthawk chun phawi suok nîng a ta;

en: and all flesh shall know that I, Jehovah, have drawn forth my sword out of its sheath; it shall not return any more.
hmr: chun, tisa tin chun kei LALPA ngeiin ka kâwlhnâm chu a bâwma inthawkin ka phawi a nih ti hrieng an ta; thun nâwk ni ta ngai naw nih.

en: Sigh therefore, thou son of man; with the breaking of thy loins and with bitterness shalt thou sigh before their eyes.
hmr: Chuleiin, inthuok huoi la, nang mihriem naupa, i kâwng chu namin rinumtitakin an mithmua chun inrûm rawh.

en: And it shall be, when they say unto thee, Wherefore sighest thou? that thou shalt say, Because of the tidings, for it cometh; and every heart shall melt, and all hands shall be feeble, and every spirit shall faint, and all knees shall be weak as water: behold, it cometh, and it shall be done, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, i kuomah, ‘Ieng am i thuokindawng pui leh?’ an ti pha chun, ‘Chanchinhai leiin, a hung tlung mêk sih a,’ tîng i ta; chun, lungril tin chu intui a ta, kut po pohai chu hung châu an ta, thlarau tin chu hung châuhâwp an ta, khûphai po po khawm chu tui angin hung zawi an tih; ngai ta, a hung mêk a, thaw khawm a ni ngei ding a nih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih, tîng i tih,” a ta.

en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuom- ah a hung tlung a,

en: Son of man, prophesy, and say, Thus saith Jehovah: Say, A sword, a sword, it is sharpened, and also furbished;
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, thu hril la, LALPA chun hieng hin a tih ti rawh: Kâwlhnâm, kâwlhnâm tâtngeiin a um a, Nâwttlêt a ni bawk a.

en: it is sharpened that it may make a slaughter; it is furbished that it may be as lightning: shall we then make mirth? the rod of my son, it contemneth every tree.
hmr: A that a that theina dinga tâtngei a na, Kâwlinlep ang a ni theina dingin nâwttlêt a ni bawk a! Hlimna ei la siem rawp ding am a nih? Ka naupa hmawl chun thing tinhai chu a hung hmusit a.

en: And it is given to be furbished, that it may be handled: the sword, it is sharpened, yea, it is furbished, to give it into the hand of the slayer.
hmr: Chun, hmang a ni theina dingin nâwttlêt dinga pêk a na; Kâwlhnâm chu, tâtngei a na, Anih, thattu kuta pêk dingin nâwttlêtin a um a nih.

en: Cry and wail, son of man; for it is upon my people, it is upon all the princes of Israel: they are delivered over to the sword with my people; smite therefore upon thy thigh.
hmr: Mihriem naupa, khêk la, inrûm rawh; ka mihai chunga tlung a na, Israel lalhai po po chungah a tlung sih a; anni chu ka mihai leh kâwlhnâm kuoma chun pêkin an um a; Chuleiin, i êlpui chu ben rawh.

en: For there is a trial; and what if even the rod that contemneth shall be no more? saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Fiena a um sih a; iengtin am ni tâng a ta, Hmawl a hmusittu khawm a um ta naw ding si chun? Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih,

en: Thou therefore, son of man, prophesy, and smite thy hands together; and let the sword be doubled the third time, the sword of the deadly wounded: it is the sword of the great one that is deadly wounded, which entereth into their chambers.
hmr: “Chuleiin, nang mihriem nau- pa, thu hril la, i kuthai chu ben la, a ṭum thumnaa chun kawlhnâm chu nawn ni sienla, thina khawp hliemna kâwlhnâm chu; thi khawp raua hliem mi pakhat ropuitak kâwlhnâm a nih; an pindanhaia lût chu.

en: I have set the threatening sword against all their gates, that their heart may melt, and their stumblings be multiplied: ah! it is made as lightning, it is pointed for slaughter.
hmr: An dâi kawtkhârhai po po zâwna chun kâwlhnâm inzum chu kân nghat a, an lungrilhai chu a hung intui theina ding le, mi tamtak an tlûk theina dingin. E, kâwlinlep anga siem a ni chu aw! dettaka chel a ni tah a.

en: Gather thee together, go to the right, set thyself in array, go to the left, whithersoever thy face is set.
hmr: Inkeikhâwm la, changtieng fe la, vân tlar la, vawi tieng fe la, chu tieng chun i hmai chu innghat la.

en: I will also smite my hands together, and I will cause my wrath to rest: I, Jehovah, have spoken it.
hmr: Kei khawma ka kuthai ben tuong ka ta, lunginsenna chu sukdei ka tih; kei LALPA chun ka ti ta a nih, ti rawh,” a ta.

en: The word of Jehovah came unto me again, saying,
hmr: LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung nâwk a,

en: Also, thou son of man, appoint thee two ways, that the sword of the king of Babylon may come; they twain shall come forth out of one land: and mark out a place, mark it out at the head of the way to the city.
hmr: “Nang mihriem naupa, Babulon lal kâwlhnâm chu a hung theina dingin lampui pahni ruot bawk rawh; An pahni chun ram pakhata in- thawkin hung suok an ta; hmun pa- khat inchik an ta, khawpui lûtna lam tluongpui laia chun inchik an tih.

en: Thou shalt appoint a way for the sword to come to Rabbah of the children of Ammon, and to Judah in Jerusalem the fortified.
hmr: Ammon thlahai Rabba kuoma le inhumhimna Juda rama Jerusalema kâwlhnâm hungna dingin lampui ruot la;

en: For the king of Babylon stood at the parting of the way, at the head of the two ways, to use divination: he shook the arrows to and fro, he consulted the teraphim, he looked in the liver.
hmr: Babulon lal chu lampui inṭhena lai, lampui pahnihai inchinna taka chun, dawi hmang dingin a ngîr zing sih a; hnungtieng hmatieng thalhai chu a hêm vêl a, milimhai chu a râwn a, sathin chu a en bawk a.

en: In his right hand was the divination for Jerusalem, to set battering rams, to open the mouth in the slaughter, to lift up the voice with shouting, to set battering rams against the gates, to cast up mounds, to build forts.
hmr: A changtieng kuta chun Jerusa- lem ta dinga, kâphmunhai siemna ding le, thattuhai ta ding bau kâk ding le, khêka râwl insuo ding le, dâi kawtkhârhai epa kâphmunhai siem ding le, hnuoi dêng pâwnghai siem a, kulhai bâwl ding thu aisânna chu a um a.

en: And it shall be unto them as a false divination in their sight, who have sworn oaths unto them; but he bringeth iniquity to remembrance, that they may be taken.
hmr: An kuoma ṭawngsiehaia lo inkhâm ta khawm chu an mithmu chun an ta dingin aisânna teplo nîng a tih; amiruokchu, chu chun suolna chu hriet zing dingah a hung lâk a, anni chu lâk an ni theina dingin.

en: Therefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Because ye have made your iniquity to be remembered, in that your transgressions are uncovered, so that in all your doings your sins do appear; because that ye are come to remembrance, ye shall be taken with the hand.
hmr: Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng ang hin a tih: in bâwsietnahai chu hmusuokin a um a, insuolnahai chu hriet zing dingin in siem ta leiin, thil in thaw taphawthaia chun in suolnahai chu hung inlang vêng an tih, hriet zingna dinga chun i hung um ta leiin, kuta lâk nîng i tih.

en: And thou, O deadly wounded wicked one, the prince of Israel, whose day is come, in the time of the iniquity of the end,
hmr: Chun, nang aw thi khawp raua hliem mi rilo, Israel lal, ama ni chu a hung tlung mêk a, a tâwpnaa hremna huna hin;

en: thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Remove the mitre, and take off the crown; this shall be no more the same; exalt that which is low, and abase that which is high.
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Lallukhum chu sawn la, lallukhum chu la hmang rawh; hi hi a pângngai zing ni ta naw ni; ân hnuoi chu chawimawi la, ân sâng chu sukhnuoi rawh.

en: I will overturn, overturn, overturn it: this also shall be no more, until he come whose right it is; and I will give it him.
hmr: Inletling ka ta, letling ka ta, letling ka ta, hi khawm hi um ta naw nih a, a thuneitu a hung hmakhat chun; chun, ama kuoma chun pêng ka tih.

en: And thou, son of man, prophesy, and say, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah concerning the children of Ammon, and concerning their reproach; and say thou, A sword, a sword is drawn, for the slaughter it is furbished, to cause it to devour, that it may be as lightning;
hmr: “Chun, nang mihriem naupa, thu hril la, Ammon thlahai le anni vaulâwkna, chungthua chun Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih, ti rawh: Kâwlhnâm, kâwlhnâm chu thatna dingin phawi a nih a, kâwlin- lep ang ela tle zawr zawr dinga nâwt tlêt a nih.

en: while they see for thee false visions, while they divine lies unto thee, to lay thee upon the necks of the wicked that are deadly wounded, whose day is come in the time of the iniquity of the end.
hmr: an hremna nuhnungtak ding hun, mi rilo tâwpkhâwkhai ringa in- nghat ding ni tlung mêk zing laiin thilhmulâwk teplo hmupêk chein aisânna khêlhlip an hrilpêk che a nih.

en: Cause it to return into its sheath. In the place where thou wast created, in the land of thy birth, will I judge thee.
hmr: A bâwma chun thun kîr nâwk el rawh. Siema i umna hmunah, i pien ipatna ram ngeia chun i chungah ro rêl ka tih.

en: And I will pour out mine indignation upon thee; I will blow upon thee with the fire of my wrath; and I will deliver thee into the hand of brutish men, skilful to destroy.
hmr: I chunga chun ka lunginsenna chu hung bunthlâng ka ta, ka lunginsenna mei chu i chunga chun hung mût ka tih; chun, mi hrânghai, that dân thiemtakhai kuta chun pesuok ka ti che.

en: Thou shalt be for fuel to the fire; thy blood shall be in the midst of the land; thou shalt be no more remembered: for I, Jehovah, have spoken it.
hmr: Nang chu meia thingthu ding chau ni tâng i ta; i thisen chu rama chun um a ta; nang chu hriet zing ni ta bawk naw ti ni, kei LALPA hin ka hril ta sih a,” tiin.

en: Moreover the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chu nawa khawm chun LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a;

en: And thou, son of man, wilt thou judge, wilt thou judge the bloody city? then cause her to know all her abominations.
hmr: “Nang mihriem naupa, khawpui thisen insuo hmang chungthu hi i rêl ding am a nih, i rêl ding am a nih? A tirdakumnahai po po chu inhriettir vawng rawh.

en: And thou shalt say, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: A city that sheddeth blood in the midst of her, that her time may come, and that maketh idols against herself to defile her!
hmr: Chun, hieng hin tîng i ta, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Khawpui a sûnga a hun a hung tlung theina dinga thisen insuotu le, ama insukpawrchena dinga milimhai siem- tu chu!

en: Thou art become guilty in thy blood that thou hast shed, and art defiled in thine idols which thou hast made; and thou hast caused thy days to draw near, and art come even unto thy years: therefore have I made thee a reproach unto the nations, and a mocking to all the countries.
hmr: I thisen i lo insuotahaia chun thiemlo chang i lo ni tah a; milim i lo siemahai chun nang chu i lo in- sukpawrche ta bawk a; i nihai chu hung hnai dingin i siem a, i kumhai bi ruota chun i hung tlung ṭêp ta bawk a, chuleiin, hnamhai laia chun hril- insîmah ka siem che a nih, ram- bunghai po poa nuizabûr dinga leh.

en: Those that are near, and those that are far from thee, shall mock thee, thou infamous one and full of tumult.
hmr: Chuong nanga hnaia umhai le nanga hlata umhai chun, nang buoinaa sip le, hmingse ta chu nuisan an ti cheh a.

en: Behold, the princes of Israel, every one according to his power, have been in thee to shed blood.
hmr: Ngai ta, Israel lalhai mi tin chu a thilthawtheina ang peia, thisen insuo dingin i sûnga chun a um a nih.

en: In thee have they set light by father and mother; in the midst of thee have they dealt by oppression with the sojourner; in thee have they wronged the fatherless and the widow.
hmr: I sûnga chun nu le pa chu hmu- sitin an um a; i sûnga chun mikhuol- hai chu nêksâwrin an sawisah a; i sûnga chun pa neilohai le hmeithai chu an sukkhawhlo tah a.

en: Thou hast despised my holy things, and hast profaned my sabbaths.
hmr: Nang chun ka thil inthienghai chu i hmusit a; ka châwlnihai khawm chu i lo bawsiet tah a.

en: Slanderous men have been in thee to shed blood; and in thee they have eaten upon the mountains: in the midst of thee they have committed lewdness.
hmr: I sûnga chun thisen insuo ding- in mi bautamhai an um a; i sûnga chun tlâng sâng chungahai chun an fâk bawk a; i sûnga chun hurna thil khawhlo khawm chu an lo thaw tah a.

en: In thee have they uncovered their fathers’ nakedness; in thee have they humbled her that was unclean in her impurity.
hmr: I sûnga chun an thlatuhai sa- ruokna chu an hlîmpêk a; i sûnga chun nuhmei inthieng naw lai zâlpui an um a,

en: And one hath committed abomination with his neighbor’s wife; and another hath lewdly defiled his daughter-in-law; and another in thee hath humbled his sister, his father’s daughter.
hmr: Mi pakhat chun a tuolbâwm nuhmei chunga chun thil tirdakum chu a thawh a; mi dang chun hurtak- in a monu chu a sukpawrche bawk a; mi dang chun i sûngah a pa naunu, a farnu chu ân tlâwm bawk a.

en: In thee have they taken bribes to shed blood; thou hast taken interest and increase, and thou hast greedily gained of thy neighbors by oppression, and hast forgotten me, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: I sûnga chun thisen insuo dingin thamnahai an lâk a; a pung hnawtna le a pung chu i lâk a; nêksâwrnain i tuolbâwmhai chunga chun duâmtakin i lo hlêp tah a; kei i mi lo theinghil tah a nih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

en: Behold, therefore, I have smitten my hand at thy dishonest gain which thou hast made, and at thy blood which hath been in the midst of thee.
hmr: Chuleiin, ngai ta, i hlêpna ringum lo, i lo thaw tah le, i sûnga i thisen i lo insuo tâk chunga chun ka kuthai ka ben el a nih.

en: Can thy heart endure, or can thy hands be strong, in the days that I shall deal with thee? I, Jehovah, have spoken it, and will do it.
hmr: Nangma chu ka sawisak nihaia che chun i kuthai chu a hrât tâwkin, i lungril chun a tuor zo ding am a nih? Kei LALPA hin ka hril tah a, thaw ngei bawk ka tih.

en: And I will scatter thee among the nations, and disperse thee through the countries; and I will consume thy filthiness out of thee.
hmr: Hnamhai laia chun sukdar ka ti cheh a, rambunghaia chun sukdar bawk ka ti che; i tirdakumna chu nangmaa inthawk chun sukbohmang tâng ka tih,

en: And thou shalt be profaned in thyself, in the sight of the nations; and thou shalt know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, hnamhai mithmua chun nangma le nangma ngei chu insuk- hmingsieng i ta; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng i tih,” tiin.

en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a;

en: Son of man, the house of Israel is become dross unto me: all of them are brass and tin and iron and lead, in the midst of the furnace; they are the dross of silver.
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, Israel sûng- kuo hi ka ta dingin êksie an ni tah; pûm meia chun an rêng chun darsen dâm, rângva dâm, thîr dâm, suon dâm an na; tangkaraw êksie chu an nih.

en: Therefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Because ye are all become dross, therefore, behold, I will gather you into the midst of Jerusalem.
hmr: Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Êksie chu in hung ni tâk leiin ngai ta u, Jerusalem sûnga hin kei khâwm ka ti cheu.

en: As they gather silver and brass and iron and lead and tin into the midst of the furnace, to blow the fire upon it, to melt it; so will I gather you in mine anger and in my wrath, and I will lay you there, and melt you.
hmr: Tangkaruo dâm, dârsen dâm, thîr dâm, rângva dâm, suon dâm pûmmeia an mût dinga suktui dinga an lâk khâwm angin, ka lunginsenna le ka ṭiumnain la khâwm ka ti cheu a, chutaka chun sieng ka ti cheu a, suktui ka ti cheu.

en: Yea, I will gather you, and blow upon you with the fire of my wrath, and ye shall be melted in the midst thereof.
hmr: Anih, la khâwm ka ti cheu a, ka lunginsenna meiin râwng ka ti cheu; chuongchun, chutaka chun intui in tih.

en: As silver is melted in the midst of the furnace, so shall ye be melted in the midst thereof; and ye shall know that I, Jehovah, have poured out my wrath upon you.
hmr: Tangkaruo chu pûmmeia ân tui angin chuong ang chun chutaka chun intui in tih, chuongchun, kei LALPA hin in chungah ka lunginsenna chu ka hung bunthlâk a nih ti hre tâng in tih,” tiin.

en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuom- ah a hung tlung a:

en: Son of man, say unto her, Thou art a land that is not cleansed, nor rained upon in the day of indignation.
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, amanu kuoma chun hril la; Ram thienglo le, lungin- senna nia a chunga ruo tlâk nawna ang chu i nih, ti rawh.

en: There is a conspiracy of her prophets in the midst thereof, like a roaring lion ravening the prey: they have devoured souls; they take treasure and precious things; they have made her widows many in the midst thereof.
hmr: Sakeibaknei inrûmin a sa fâk ding ân rûm khum angin, a sûnga chun a zâwlneihai chu phierrûkna a um a; mi tin hringin an fâk zo a, thil hluhai le thil rohai chu an lâk a, a sûnga chun hmeithai tamtak an siem a.

en: Her priests have done violence to my law, and have profaned my holy things: they have made no distinction between the holy and the common, neither have they caused men to discern between the unclean and the clean, and have hid their eyes from my sabbaths, and I am profaned among them.
hmr: A thiempuhai chun ka dâna chun thawluina an hmang a; ka thil inthienghai chu an sukpawrche a; thil pângngai le thil inthieng khawm chu an ṭhe hran nawh a, chuongchun, mihai khawm chu thil inthieng le thienglo chu hre hran dingin an siem nawh a; ka châwlnia inthawkin an mithai an hup a; anni laia chun sukhmingsiet ka ni tah a nih.

en: Her princes in the midst thereof are like wolves ravening the prey, to shed blood, and to destroy souls, that they may get dishonest gain.
hmr: A sûnga a lalhai chu satene an sa fâk ding innghir khumhai ang chu an na; thisen insuoa, mi hring sukbo- hmanga hlâwkna indik lo an hmuna dingin.

en: And her prophets have daubed for them with untempered mortar, seeing false visions, and divining lies unto them, saying, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah, when Jehovah hath not spoken.
hmr: Chun, a zâwlneihai chun an kuoma aisân inkhêlhai le, teplohai chu hmuin anni ta ding chun chirhak sukhnâk lo chun an chârkhum a; LALPAIN thu a hril naw sa khawma, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih, an tih a.

en: The people of the land have used oppression, and exercised robbery; yea, they have vexed the poor and needy, and have oppressed the sojourner wrongfully.
hmr: Chu ram mipuihai chun nêk- sâwrna an hmang a, inrûk an chîng bawk a; anih, tlasamhai le mi rimsi- hai chu an suklungngai a; mikhuol chu indik lotakin an nêksâwr a.

en: And I sought for a man among them, that should build up the wall, and stand in the gap before me for the land, that I should not destroy it; but I found none.
hmr: Anni lai chun mi, ram chu ka suksiet nawna dinga dâi chu siem ṭha ding le, ram ta dinga, ân âwngnaa ka hmaa ngîr ding ka zawng a, nisien- lakhawm, tukhawm ka hmu nawh a,

en: Therefore have I poured out mine indignation upon them; I have consumed them with the fire of my wrath: their own way have I brought upon their heads, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Chuleiin, ka lunginsenna chu an chunga chun ka bunthlâk a, ka lunginsenna mei chun anni chu ka kâng hmang tah a; an lampuihai chu anni lu chunga ngei chun ka hung intlungtir tah a, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih,” tiin.

en: The word of Jehovah came again unto me, saying,
hmr: LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung nâwk a:

en: Son of man, there were two women, the daughters of one mother:
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, Nuhmei pahni, nu pakhat naunuhmeihai chu an um a;

en: and they played the harlot in Egypt; they played the harlot in their youth; there were their breasts pressed, and there was handled the bosom of their virginity.
hmr: Aiguptaa chun nawchizawr sin an thawh a, an tleirâwla inthawkin nawchizawr sin chu an thaw a na, an nênehai chu hmet a na, chuongchun, an nunghâk inthiengna nêne chu hmet zêk a na.

en: And the names of them were Oholah the elder, and Oholibah her sister: and they became mine, and they bare sons and daughters. And as for their names, Samaria is Oholah, and Jerusalem Oholibah.
hmr: An hminghai chu, a upa lem chu Ohola a na, a sangnu chu Oholiba a nih; ka ta an hung ni a, naupasalhai le naunuhmeihai an hung nei tah a. Chun, an hming thua chun Ohola chu Samaria a na, Oholiba chu Jerusalem chu a nih.

en: And Oholah played the harlot when she was mine; and she doted on her lovers, on the Assyrians her neighbors,
hmr: Chun, Ohola chun ka ta a ni sûng khawm chun nawchi a zawr a; a dit zâwnghai a tuolbâwm Assuria mihai ân saipuia,

en: who were clothed with blue, governors and rulers, all of them desirable young men, horsemen riding upon horses.
hmr: a dum pâwla incheihai, ram awp- tuhai le rorêltuhai le tlangvâl ditumtak tak sakawr chung chuong mi sakawr chunga chuonghai chu.

en: And she bestowed her whoredoms upon them, the choicest men of Assyria all of them; and on whomsoever she doted, with all their idols she defiled herself.
hmr: An kuoma chun a nawchizawrna chu a pêk a, an rêng chun Assuria mi ditumtak takhai an na, chun, tukhawm ân saipui taphawthai chu, an milimhaia chun ama chu ân suk- pawrche ve pei tah a.

en: Neither hath she left her whoredoms since the days of Egypt; for in her youth they lay with her, and they handled the bosom of her virginity; and they poured out their whoredom upon her.
hmr: Aiguptaa umna nihaia inthawk ta khan a nawchizawr chu a ma nawh a, a tleirâwl lai an lo zâlpui a; a nunghâk inthieng nêne hmûrhai chu an lo sukhliem ta sih a; chuongchun, an hurna chu a chunga chun an lo bunthlâk tah a.

en: Wherefore I delivered her into the hand of her lovers, into the hand of the Assyrians, upon whom she doted.
hmr: Chuleichun, a hmangaihai kut- ah, a însaipui Assuria mihai kuta chun ka pêk suok tah a.

en: These uncovered her nakedness; they took her sons and her daughters; and her they slew with the sword: and she became a byword among women; for they executed judgments upon her.
hmr: Chuonghai chun a saruokna chu an hlîmpêk a, a naupasalhai le a naunuhmeihai chu an lâkpêk a; ama le chun kâwlhnâmin an that a, ama chu nuhmeihai laia ṭawngnaa hmang a lo ni tah a, ama chunga chun rorêlna chu an lo sukthlûk ta sih a.

en: And her sister Oholibah saw this, yet was she more corrupt in her doting than she, and in her whoredoms which were more than the whoredoms of her sister.
hmr: “Chun, a unaunu Oholiba khawm chun hi hi a hmu zing a, anachu, ama chu a mi insaipuinaa chun ama nêk hin nasatakin ân suksiet lemin, a nawchizawrnaa khawm chun a unau- nu nawchizawrna nêkin a nasa lem a.

en: She doted upon the Assyrians, governors and rulers, her neighbors, clothed most gorgeously, horsemen riding upon horses, all of them desirable young men.
hmr: Ama chun Assuria mihai, ram awptuhai, rorêltuhai, a tuolbâwmhai chu, ropuitaka incheihai, sakawr chung chuong mi sakawr chunga chuonghai, an rênga tlangvâl ditum- tak takhai chu ân saipui a.

en: And I saw that she was defiled; they both took one way.
hmr: Chun, ama chu an sukpawrche ti ka hmuh a, an pahni chun lampui thuhmun an hraw leiin.

en: And she increased her whoredoms; for she saw men portrayed upon the wall, the images of the Chaldeans portrayed with vermilion,
hmr: Chun, a nawchizawrna chu a sukzuol pei a, bang chunga chun mihriemhai lim zieka umhai chu a hmu sih a; Kaldaihai lim sen mawia incheia ziek,

en: girded with girdles upon their loins, with flowing turbans upon their heads, all of them princes to look upon, after the likeness of the Babylonians in Chaldea, the land of their nativity.
hmr: an kâwnghaia kâwngkhitnaa inkhit an luhaia lukâwm sukdum kâwma, hang en khawma lalhai ang, an piengna rama Kaldaia Babulon mi nina nei chie ruok an nih.

en: And as soon as she saw them she doted upon them, and sent messengers unto them into Chaldea.
hmr: Chun, a hmu phingle chun ama chun ân saipui a; Kaldaia chun an kuomah mitirhai a tir a.

en: And the Babylonians came to her into the bed of love, and they defiled her with their whoredom, and she was polluted with them, and her soul was alienated from them.
hmr: Chun, Babulon mi chu a kuoma inditna khuma chun a hung a, an nawchizawrna chun ama chu an sukpawrche a, anni le chun a lo pawr- che tah a, a lungril chun anni chu a ngei ta hle a.

en: So she uncovered her whoredoms, and uncovered her nakedness: then my soul was alienated from her, like as my soul was alienated from her sister.
hmr: Chuongchun, a nawchizawrna chu langchangtaka a thaw a, a saruokna a hlîm chun, ka lungril chu amaa inthawk chun ân her a, a unaunua inthawka ka lungril a lo inher ta ang bawk khan.

en: Yet she multiplied her whoredoms, remembering the days of her youth, wherein she had played the harlot in the land of Egypt.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, Aigupta rama nawchizawr thil a thaw lai, a tleirâwl lai nihai chu hre zingin, a hurnahai chu a la belsa ta rawp a.

en: And she doted upon their paramours, whose flesh is as the flesh of asses, and whose issue is like the issue of horses.
hmr: An tisa khawm sabengtunghai tisa ang, an thilsuok khawm sakawr- hai thilsuok ang, an mi lepchiehai chu ân saipui a.

en: Thus thou calledst to remembrance the lewdness of thy youth, in the handling of thy bosom by the Egyptians for the breasts of thy youth.
hmr: Chuongchun, Aigupta rama i tleirâwl lai nênehai an hmeta, a hmûrhai an hmet zêk lai a, i tleirâwl- lai hurna chu i ngai a.

en: Therefore, O Oholibah, thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I will raise up thy lovers against thee, from whom thy soul is alienated, and I will bring them against thee on every side:
hmr: “Chuleiin, Oholiba, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Ngai ta, i dit zâwnghai chu i chungah hung inṭuongtir ka ta; i lungrilin a hran- sanhai chu, sîr tina chun i chungah inhungtir ka tih;

en: the Babylonians and all the Chaldeans, Pekod and Shoa and Koa, and all the Assyrians with them; desirable young men, governors and rulers all of them, princes and men of renown, all of them riding upon horses.
hmr: Babulon mihai, Kaldai mihai po po le, Pekod mihai, Soa mihai, Hoa mihai, anni le Assuria mihai po po leh; tlangvâl ditumtak takhai, ram awptuhai, rorêltuhai, an rêngin lal nauhai, mi hming inthanghai, an rêngin sakawr chunga chuong mihai chu.

en: And they shall come against thee with weapons, chariots, and wagons, and with a company of peoples; they shall set themselves against thee with buckler and shield and helmet round about: and I will commit the judgment unto them, and they shall judge thee according to their judgments.
hmr: Chun, nanga chunga chun hriemhreihai, sakawr tawlailîrhai, tawlailîrhai, mipui inkhâwm nasa- tak leh hung do an ti cheh a; a vêlin, thîr lukhumhai, âwmphawhai le phawhai leh an hung ep ding che a nih; chun, an kuoma chun rorêlna dân ang peiin i chungah rorêlpêk an ti che.

en: And I will set my jealousy against thee, and they shall deal with thee in fury; they shall take away thy nose and thine ears; and thy residue shall fall by the sword: they shall take thy sons and thy daughters; and thy residue shall be devoured by the fire.
hmr: I chunga chun ka îtthîkna chu sieng ka ta, i chunga chun lunginsen pumin thâwng an tih; i hnâr le i nahai chu la hmang an ta; i la mahlahai chu kâwlhnâmah tlûng an tih; i naupa- salhai, i naunuhmeihai chu lâng an ta, i la mahlahai chu meiin kâng hmang vawng a tih.

en: They shall also strip thee of thy clothes, and take away thy fair jewels.
hmr: Chun, nang khawm i silfênhai chu hlîppêk an ti cheh a, în cheina man tamhai chu la hmang an tih.

en: Thus will I make thy lewdness to cease from thee, and thy whoredom brought from the land of Egypt; so that thou shalt not lift up thine eyes unto them, nor remember Egypt any more.
hmr: Chuongchun, Aigupta rama i nawchizawrna hung lâk le, i hurna chu nangmaa inthawka bo ta dingin siem ka ta; chuongchun, anni chu i mithai chun mel ta ngai naw nih a, Aigupta chu hre zing ta bawk naw ti nih.

en: For thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I will deliver thee into the hand of them whom thou hatest, into the hand of them from whom thy soul is alienated;
hmr: Hieng hin Lalpa PATHIEN chun a ti sih a: Ngai ta, i theidahai kuta le, i lungrilin a hransanhai kuta chun ka pêk suok ding che a nih;

en: and they shall deal with thee in hatred, and shall take away all thy labor, and shall leave thee naked and bare; and the nakedness of thy whoredoms shall be uncovered, both thy lewdness and thy whoredoms.
hmr: theida hlêng an ti cheh a, i sinthaw inrimna po po chu la hmang vawng an ta, saruok le silfên boin mâksan an ti che; chun, i hurna saruokna chu hlîm nîng a ta, i hurna le i nawchizawrna chu.

en: These things shall be done unto thee, for that thou hast played the harlot after the nations, and because thou art polluted with their idols.
hmr: Hieng thilhai hi i chungah thawin a um ding a nih; khawhri be mihai hnung chu châkin i lo hnawt tah a, an milimhai chun i lo insuk- pawrche ta si leiin.

en: Thou hast walked in the way of thy sister; therefore will I give her cup into thy hand.
hmr: I unaunu lampuia chun i lo fe tah a; chuleiin, ama no chu i kutah ka pêk ding a nih.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Thou shalt drink of thy sister’s cup, which is deep and large; thou shalt be laughed to scorn and had in derision; it containeth much.
hmr: “Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: I unaunu no tung lientak chu i dâwn ding a nih, Hmusita nuisanin um i ta, hrilinsîm ni bawk i tih, A keng râwn hle sih a;

en: Thou shalt be filled with drunkenness and sorrow, with the cup of astonishment and desolation, with the cup of thy sister Samaria.
hmr: Lungngaina le inruinain sip tâng i ta, Râusanna le maktina no, i zuorpuinu Samaria no le chun Dâwn khawm dâwn ngei i ta, thlâksuok i ta,

en: Thou shalt even drink it and drain it out, and thou shalt gnaw the sherds thereof, and shalt tear thy breasts; for I have spoken it, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Chutaka a nâwihai chu, sawi i ta, I nênehai chu sukhliem i tih; Ka lo hril ta sih a, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

en: Therefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Because thou hast forgotten me, and cast me behind thy back, therefore bear thou also thy lewdness and thy whoredoms.
hmr: “Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Kei i mi lo theinghil tah a, i hnungah i mi pei tah a, chuleiin, i hurna le i nawchizawr- nahai chu nangin phur rawh,” tiin.

en: Jehovah said moreover unto me: Son of man, wilt thou judge Oholah and Oholibah? then declare unto them their abominations.
hmr: Chu nawa khawm chun LALPA chun ka kuomah a hril a, “Mihriem naupa, Ohola le Oholiba chungthu hi i rêl ding am? an tirdakumnahai chu anni hril la.

en: For they have committed adultery, and blood is in their hands; and with their idols have they committed adultery; and they have also caused their sons, whom they bare unto me, to pass through the fire unto them to be devoured.
hmr: An lo uire ta sih a, an kuthaia chun thisen a kai a; an milimhai chun uiretna thil chu an lo thaw tah a; chun, an naupasalhai an mi neipêk- hai khawm chu, an kuomah fâk zoa um dingin meia chun an infethleng- tir a.

en: Moreover this they have done unto me: they have defiled my sanctuary in the same day, and have profaned my sabbaths.
hmr: Chu naw khawm chu hi hi ka chungah an thaw bawk a; a ni pâng- ngaia ma chun ka hmun inthieng chu an sukpawrcheh a, ka châwlnihai khawm chu an lo bawsiet tah a.

en: For when they had slain their children to their idols, then they came the same day into my sanctuary to profane it; and, lo, thus have they done in the midst of my house.
hmr: An milimhai kuoma an nauhai an that laiin, chu nia ma chun ka hmun inthieng chu sukpawrche dingin an hung sih a; chun, ngai ta, ka in sûnga chun chuong ang chun an thaw a nih.

en: And furthermore ye have sent for men that come from far, unto whom a messenger was sent, and, lo, they came; for whom thou didst wash thyself, paint thine eyes, and deck thyself with ornaments,
hmr: Chu nawa chun, hlataka in- thawka hung ding mihai ta ding chun mi i tir a, an kuoma chun mitir chu tir a na; chun, ngai ta, an hung tah a; chuong ta ding chun în sâwp a, i mithai i nâl a, incheinahaiin în chei a;

en: and sit upon a stately bed, with a table prepared before it, whereupon thou didst set mine incense and mine oil.
hmr: lal khum a hmaa dawkân buot- saia um chunga chun i ṭhung a, chu chunga chun ka riminhnikhai le ka hriek chu i sie kha.

en: And the voice of a multitude being at ease was with her: and with men of the common sort were brought drunkards from the wilderness; and they put bracelets upon the hands of them twain, and beautiful crowns upon their heads.
hmr: Chun, mipui râwl inhawitihai chu a kuoma chun a um a; chun, mi chi narânhai le chun thlalêra in- thawkin zu inrui mihai chu hung ṭhuoi an na. An kuthaia chun bân- bunhai chu a thuoin an inbuntir a, an luhai chunga chun lallukhum mawi- takhai le chun.

en: Then said I of her that was old in adulteries, Now will they play the harlot with her, and she with them.
hmr: Chun, kei chun uirea a upa lemnu kuoma chun, ‘Tuhin anni chun ama le uiretna thil chu an thawin, ama khawma anni leh a thaw ding am aw?’ ka tih a.

en: And they went in unto her, as they go in unto a harlot: so went they in unto Oholah and unto Oholibah, the lewd women.
hmr: Nuhmei nawchizawr hlak kuoma an lût hlak angin, anni chu ama kuoma chun an lût tah a; chuongchun, nuhmei hur, Ohola le Oholiba kuoma chun an lût tah a.

en: And righteous men, they shall judge them with the judgment of adulteresses, and with the judgment of women that shed blood; because they are adulteresses, and blood is in their hands.
hmr: Mi felhai chun, anni chu uirenu chunga rorêl ang le, nuhmei thisen insuotu chunga rorêl angin rorêlpêk an tih; uirenuhai an na, an kutahai chun thisen a kai bawk si leiin.

en: For thus saith the Lord Jehovah: I will bring up a company against them, and will give them to be tossed to and fro and robbed.
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a ti sih a; An chungah mipui in- khâwm hung ṭhuoi ka ta, anni chu a suk a tunga vawrlênga suksiet dingin an kuomah pêng ka tih.

en: And the company shall stone them with stones, and despatch them with their swords; they shall slay their sons and their daughters, and burn up their houses with fire.
hmr: Chun, mipui inkhâwmhai chun anni chu lungin dêng an ta; an kâwl- hnâmhai chun that an ta; an naupa- salhai le an naunuhmeihai chu that an ta, an inhai chu meiin raw hâwp an tih.

en: Thus will I cause lewdness to cease out of the land, that all women may be taught not to do after your lewdness.
hmr: Chuongchun, hurna chu chu rama inthawka bo dingin siem ka ta, nuhmeihai po po chu in hurna ang thaw lo dinga inchûktir an ni theina dingin.

en: And they shall recompense your lewdness upon you, and ye shall bear the sins of your idols; and ye shall know that I am the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, in hurna chu in chungah thung an ti cheu a, in milimhai suolna chu phur in ta, chun, Lalpa PATHIEN chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng in tih,” tiin.

en: Again, in the ninth year, in the tenth month, in the tenth day of the month, the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Kum kuona kum, thla sâwm- na, chu thla ni sâwm ni chun LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung nâwk a;

en: Son of man, write thee the name of the day, even of this selfsame day: the king of Babylon drew close unto Jerusalem this selfsame day.
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, hi ni hin Babulon lal chun Jerusalem a hung hnai a nih.

en: And utter a parable unto the rebellious house, and say unto them, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah, Set on the caldron, set it on, and also pour water into it:
hmr: Chun, sûngkaw hel hmanghai kuoma chun tekhithu hril la, an kuoma chun, ‘Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng ang hin a tih: Sumbepui inchuon unla, inchuon unla, A sûnga chun tui buok unla;

en: gather the pieces thereof into it, even every good piece, the thigh, and the shoulder; fill it with the choice bones.
hmr: Chun, chutaka chun a sa tlinhai thlâk unla, A tlang ṭha deu deuhai, a mal le a dârhai le A ru tuihnâihai chun suksip ro.

en: Take the choice of the flock, and also a pile of wood for the bones under the caldron; make it boil well; yea, let the bones thereof be boiled in the midst of it.
hmr: Ran ruol laia ditumtak chu la unla, A ruhai chu a hnuoi tieng sie unla, Insoṭhattir hle unla, a ruhai chu but ro;

en: Wherefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Woe to the bloody city, to the caldron whose rust is therein, and whose rust is not gone out of it! take out of it piece after piece; No lot is fallen upon it.
hmr: “Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Khawpui, thisen insuo hmang chu a chung a rik, sum- bepui a tuiêkna a sûnga um le, a tuiêkna khawm bo thei lo chu, a chung a rik! a tlang tlangin la suok rawh, thlang bik nei loin.

en: For her blood is in the midst of her; she set it upon the bare rock; she poured it not upon the ground, to cover it with dust.
hmr: A thisen chu ama sûnga chun a um sih a, lungpui ruok chunga chun ân suoh a; pilvuta zuk vurkhum theina ding, leihnuoi chunga chun a bunthlâk si nawh a.

en: That it may cause wrath to come up to take vengeance, I have set her blood upon the bare rock, that it should not be covered.
hmr: Phuba la dinga hung tlung dinga lunginsenna chu ân umtir theina dingin, a thisen chu lungpui ruok chunga chun kân suoh a, inkhum a ni nawna dingin.

en: Therefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Woe to the bloody city! I also will make the pile great.
hmr: Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Khawpui thisen insuo hmang chu a chung a rik! Kei khawma a thing sep khawm chu suklien ka ta.

en: Heap on the wood, make the fire hot, boil well the flesh, and make thick the broth, and let the bones be burned.
hmr: Thing buk ṭeu la, mei ti chawk ṭha la, sa chu intlawk ṭhattir hle la, a tuihâng chu hâng deuin, a ruhai chu râw hmang ni raw se.

en: Then set it empty upon the coals thereof, that it may be hot, and the brass thereof may burn, and that the filthiness of it may be molten in it, that the rust of it may be consumed.
hmr: Chun, meiling chunga chun a ruokin inchuon la, a hung luma, a dârsen chu a hung inling theina dingin, chuongchun, ân thieng nawna chu a sûnga chun a hung intui theina dingin le, a tuiêkhai chu a hung kâng- hmang theina dingin.

en: She hath wearied herself with toil; yet her great rust goeth not forth out of her; her rust goeth not forth by fire.
hmr: Sâwl neng khawpa thaw hnung khawmin a tuiêkna chu amaa in- thawk chun a tlan hmang si nawh a; a tuiêkna chu mei khawma a sukbo thei nawh.

en: In thy filthiness is lewdness: because I have cleansed thee and thou wast not cleansed, thou shalt not be cleansed from thy filthiness any more, till I have caused my wrath toward thee to rest.
hmr: I pawrchenaa chun hurna a um a; ka sukfai cheh a, sukfaia i um naw leiin, i pawrchenaa inthawkin sukfai ni ngai ta hrim hrim naw ti ni, ka lunginsenna hi i chunga ka suk- lungâwi hmakhat chun.

en: I, Jehovah, have spoken it: it shall come to pass, and I will do it: I will not go back, neither will I spare, neither will I repent; according to thy ways, and according to thy doings, shall they judge thee, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Kei LALPA chun ka hril tah a, hung tlung ngei a ta, thaw khawm thâwng ka tih, kîr nâwk naw ning a, hla naw nîng a, insîr bawk naw ning; i um dânhai ang pei le i thilthawhai ang peiin ro rêlpêk an ti che, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih,” tiin.

en: Also the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung nâwk a:

en: Son of man, behold, I take away from thee the desire of thine eyes with a stroke: yet thou shalt neither mourn nor weep, neither shall thy tears run down.
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, ngai ta, thâwkkhatin i mithai châkna chu nangmaa inthawkin ka lâk hmang ding a nih; ṭap naw ti nih a, sûn bawk naw ti ni, i mitthlihai khawm luong thla bawk naw ni.

en: Sigh, but not aloud, make no mourning for the dead; bind thy headtire upon thee, and put thy shoes upon thy feet, and cover not thy lips, and eat not the bread of men.
hmr: Inthuok huoi la, amiruokchu, inring loin, mithi ta ding chun sûnna siem naw la, i lukâwm chu kâwm la, i kehaia chun i kekawkhai chu bun la, i hmûrhai chu hup naw la, lusûntuhai bei chu fa naw rawh,” tiin.

en: So I spake unto the people in the morning; and at even my wife died; and I did in the morning as I was commanded.
hmr: Chuongchun, zîngkâr chun mi- puihai kuoma chun thu chu ka hril a, a zântieng chun ka nuhmei chu a thi tah a; chun, thu pêka ka um ang chun zîngkâr chun ka thaw tah a.

en: And the people said unto me, Wilt thou not tell us what these things are to us, that thou doest so?
hmr: Chun, mipuihai chun ka kuoma chun, “Hieng thil i thawhai hi, keini ta dingin ieng am an niha i mi hril naw ding maw?” an ta.

en: Then I said unto them, The word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Kei chun an kuomah, “LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a:

en: Speak unto the house of Israel, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I will profane my sanctuary, the pride of your power, the desire of your eyes, and that which your soul pitieth; and your sons and your daughters whom ye have left behind shall fall by the sword.
hmr: ‘Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun hril la, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Ngai ta, ka hmun inthieng in thilthawtheina chapopui le, in mithai châkna, in lungrilin a hmangai chu ka sukhmingsiet ding a nih; chun, in naupasalhai le in nau nuhmeihai in hnunga in mâksanhai kha kâwlhnâmah tlung an ta.

en: And ye shall do as I have done: ye shall not cover your lips, nor eat the bread of men.
hmr: Chun, ka thaw ta ang khan thâwng in ta; in hmûrhai chu inkhum naw ti niu a, mihriemhai bei chu fa bawk naw ti niu.

en: And your tires shall be upon your heads, and your shoes upon your feet: ye shall not mourn nor weep; but ye shall pine away in your iniquities, and moan one toward another.
hmr: In lu haia chun in lukâwmhai chu kâwm in ta, in kekawkhai chu in kehai chun bun in ta; ṭap naw ti niu a, sûn bawk naw ti niu; amiruokchu, in suolnaa chun riral lem in ta, insûntuo lem in tih.

en: Thus shall Ezekiel be unto you a sign; according to all that he hath done shall ye do: when this cometh, then shall ye know that I am the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Chuongchun, Ezekiel hi in ta dingin inchikna nîng a ta; amain a thaw ang tak hin thaw vêng in tih; hienghai hi a hung tlung pha chun LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng in tih.’

en: And thou, son of man, shall it not be in the day when I take from them their strength, the joy of their glory, the desire of their eyes, and that whereupon they set their heart, their sons and their daughters,
hmr: “Chun, nang mihriem naupa, an kul det, an ropuina hlimna, an mithai châkna le, an lungril an sienahai, an naupasalhai le an naunuhmeihai ka lâk pha chun,

en: that in that day he that escapeth shall come unto thee, to cause thee to hear it with thine ears?
hmr: chu nia chun a pumpeltu chu i kuomah hungin a hung inhriettir naw ding che am a nih?

en: In that day shall thy mouth be opened to him that is escaped, and thou shalt speak, and be no more dumb: so shalt thou be a sign unto them; and they shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Chu nia chun chu a pumpeltu kuoma chun i bau chu ka tâng i ta, thu hril i ta, ṭawng theiloin um ta naw ti ni; chuongchun, an ta ding chun inchikna nîng i ta; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih,” tiin.

en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a:

en: Son of man, set thy face toward the children of Ammon, and prophesy against them:
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, Ammon thlahai tieng chun i hmai innghat la, an chungchânga chun thu hril rawh;
