en: When I say to the righteous, that he shall surely live; if he trust to his righteousness, and commit iniquity, none of his righteous deeds shall be remembered; but in his iniquity that he hath committed, therein shall he die.
hmr: Mi fel kuoma chun a hring ngei ding a ni ka ti pha chun, a felna chu a ring a, suolna a thaw chun, a thil thaw felhai chu a ieng khawm hriet zing ni naw nih a; amiruokchu, a suolna a lo thaw taha chun thîng a tih.

en: Again, when I say unto the wicked, Thou shalt surely die; if he turn from his sin, and do that which is lawful and right;
hmr: Chun, mi rilo kuomah, ‘I thi ngei ding a nih,’ ka ti ve a; ama chu a suolnaa inthawk chun a hung kîr a, ân dik le dân thil chu a thaw chun;

en: if the wicked restore the pledge, give again that which he had taken by robbery, walk in the statutes of life, committing no iniquity; he shall surely live, he shall not die.
hmr: mi rilo chun bathai chu a thung a, inrûka a lâk tahai chu a pêk nâwk a, nun dân thuruot chu a hrawh a, thil a suksuol naw chun, hring ngei ngei a ta, thi naw nih.

en: None of his sins that he hath committed shall be remembered against him: he hath done that which is lawful and right; he shall surely live.
hmr: Ama chunga chun thil a lo suksuol tahai hrim hrim a ieng khawm chu hriet zing ni ta naw nih a; ân dik le dân thil chu a lo thaw tâk lei chun a hring ngei ding a nih.

en: Yet the children of thy people say, The way of the Lord is not equal: but as for them, their way is not equal.
hmr: Amiruokchu, i chipui thlahai chun, ‘Lalpa lampui chu ân ang vawng nawh a,’ an ti chun, anni chungthua ruok chun, anni lampui chu ân ang vawng naw lem a.

en: When the righteous turneth from his righteousness, and committeth iniquity, he shall even die therein.
hmr: Mi fel chu a felnaa inthawka ân herhmanga thil suol a thaw chun, chutaka chun a thi ngei ding a nih.

en: And when the wicked turneth from his wickedness, and doeth that which is lawful and right, he shall live thereby.
hmr: Chun, mi rilo chu a rîtlonaa inthawka ân her hmanga, ân dik le dân thil chu a thaw chun, chutaka bawk chun hring a tih.

en: Yet ye say, The way of the Lord is not equal. O house of Israel, I will judge you every one after his ways.
hmr: Amiruokchu, ‘Lalpa lampui chu ân ang vawng nawh,’ in la ti rawp chun, Aw Israel sûngkuo, mi tin chu ama lampuihai ang sengin, a chung- ah rorêl ka tih,” tiin.

en: And it came to pass in the twelfth year of our captivity, in the tenth month, in the fifth day of the month, that one that had escaped out of Jerusalem came unto me, saying, The city is smitten.
hmr: Kan sal intâng a kum sâwmpa- hni kum, thla sâwmna, chu thla ni nga ni chun Jerusalema inthawka hung tlân suok mi pakhat chu ka kuomah a hung a, ka kuomah “Khaw- pui chu suksiet a ni tah,” a hung tih a.

en: Now the hand of Jehovah had been upon me in the evening, before he that was escaped came; and he had opened my mouth, until he came to me in the morning; and my mouth was opened, and I was no more dumb.
hmr: Chun, chu hung tlân suok hung hma, zântieng chun LALPA kut chu ka chungah a um a, zîngkâra ka kuoma a hung hma po chun ka bau chu a mîn kâktir a; ka bau chu inkâk- tirin a um a, ṭawng thei loin ka um ta nawh a.

en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuom- ah a hung tlung a,

en: Son of man, they that inhabit those waste places in the land of Israel speak, saying, Abraham was one, and he inherited the land: but we are many; the land is given us for inheritance.
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, Israel rama hmun se tahai hluotuhai chun thu an hril a, ‘Abraham chu pakhat chau a na, ram chu a lo hluo tah a; eini hlak chu tamtak ei na, ram chu hluo dinga pêk ei ni tho a,’ tiin.

en: Wherefore say unto them, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Ye eat with the blood, and lift up your eyes unto your idols, and shed blood: and shall ye possess the land?
hmr: Chuleiin, an kuoma chun, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Thisen leh bu in fâk a, in milimhai tieng chun in mithai in inlên a, thisen in insuo a, ram chu in chang hrim ding am a nih?

en: Ye stand upon your sword, ye work abomination, and ye defile every one his neighbor’s wife: and shall ye possess the land?
hmr: In kâwlhnâm chu in ring a, thil pawrche chu in thawh a, mi tinin mâni tuolbâwm nuhmeihai chu in sukpawrcheh a; ram chu in chang hrim ding am a nih?

en: Thus shalt thou say unto them, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: As I live, surely they that are in the waste places shall fall by the sword; and him that is in the open field will I give to the beasts to be devoured; and they that are in the strongholds and in the caves shall die of the pestilence.
hmr: Hieng hin an kuoma chun hril rawh; Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Ka hring zing angin, chuong hmun se taha umhai chu kâwl- hnâmah tlûng an ta, rama umhai chu ramsahai kuomah fâk zo dingin ka pêk ding a nih; chun, kul det le pûka umhai chu hripuiin thîng an tih.

en: And I will make the land a desolation and an astonishment; and the pride of her power shall cease; and the mountains of Israel shall be desolate, so that none shall pass through.
hmr: Ram chu râusanah siem ka ta, maktia um ding leh; a thilthawtheina chapona chu re tâng a ta, Israel tlânghai chu râusan ni tâng a ta, tukhawm fethleng ta naw ni hai.

en: Then shall they know that I am Jehovah, when I have made the land a desolation and an astonishment, because of all their abominations which they have committed.
hmr: An thil pawrche lo thaw tahai po po leia ram chu râusan le maktia um dinga ka siem pha chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.

en: And as for thee, son of man, the children of thy people talk of thee by the walls and in the doors of the houses, and speak one to another, every one to his brother, saying, Come, I pray you, and hear what is the word that cometh forth from Jehovah.
hmr: “Nangma chungthua chu, mi- hriem naupa, i chipuihai thlahai chu bang hrûla le in kawtkhârhaia chun nanga chanchin an hril a, anni le anni an inbiek a, mi tinin a unau kuoma chun, ‘La hung ta, ka ngên che hi, LALPAA inthawka hung suok thu chu ieng am a nih hung ngai ta,’ an tih a.

en: And they come unto thee as the people cometh, and they sit before thee as my people, and they hear thy words, but do them not; for with their mouth they show much love, but their heart goeth after their gain.
hmr: Mipuihai chu an hung angin i kuoma chun anni chu an hung a, ka mihai angin i hmaa chun an ṭhung a, i thuhai chu an ngai a, amiruokchu, thaw si loin; an bau chun nasatakin hmangaina an inlangtir a, amiruok- chu, an lungrilhai chun an hlâwkna chu a hnawt sih a.

en: And, lo, thou art unto them as a very lovely song of one that hath a pleasant voice, and can play well on an instrument; for they hear thy words, but they do them not.
hmr: Ngai ta, an ta ding chun nang chu mi pakhat râwl ṭhatak neia, thil sutmihai sut thiem mi hla ditumtak ang chu i nih; i thuhai chu an hriet a, an thaw si nawh a.

en: And when this cometh to pass (behold, it cometh), then shall they know that a prophet hath been among them.
hmr: Chun, hi hi a hung tlung pha chun, (ngai ta, a hung tlung mêk) anni lai chun zâwlnei a lo um zing a nih, ti hre tâng an tih,” tiin.

en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a:

en: Son of man, prophesy against the shepherds of Israel, prophesy, and say unto them, even to the shepherds, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Woe unto the shepherds of Israel that do feed themselves! should not the shepherds feed the sheep?
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, Israel berâm- puhai chungah thu hril la, thu hril la, berâmpuhai kuom ngeia chun, an kuoma chun hril rawh; Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Israel berâmpuhai mâni le mâni inchâwm- tuhai chu an chung a rik de; berâm- puhai chun berâmhai chu an châwm ding a ni naw am a nih?

en: Ye eat the fat, and ye clothe you with the wool, ye kill the fatlings; but ye feed not the sheep.
hmr: Thâu chu in fâk a, sahmulin in inthuom a; châwm thâuhai chu in that a; nisienlakhawm, berâmhai chu in châwm nawh a.

en: The diseased have ye not strengthened, neither have ye healed that which was sick, neither have ye bound up that which was broken, neither have ye brought back that which was driven away, neither have ye sought that which was lost; but with force and with rigor have ye ruled over them.
hmr: A hrât naw chu in sukhrât nawh a, a na khawm chu in sukdam bawk nawh a; a tliek khawm chu in tuom nawh a, khal hmanga um ta khawm chu in hung ṭhuoi nâwk bawk nawh, ân hmang khawm chu in zawng bawk nawh; amiruokchu, thawluina le, hrohrângsetakin an chungah ro in rêl a.

en: And they were scattered, because there was no shepherd; and they became food to all the beasts of the field, and were scattered.
hmr: Anni chu berâmpu an um naw leiin an indar a; rama sahai po po ta ding chun bu an na, sukdarin an um tah a.

en: My sheep wandered through all the mountains, and upon every high hill: yea, my sheep were scattered upon all the face of the earth; and there was none that did search or seek after them.
hmr: Ka berâmhai chu tlâng po po le muol insâng tinahai chun an invâk a; anih, ka berâmhai chu leihnuoi pum- pui chunga chun an indar tah a ni hi; mi tukhawm anni chu zawnga hmu- suok tum an um si nawh.

en: Therefore, ye shepherds, hear the word of Jehovah:
hmr: Chuleiin, nangni berâmpuhai, LALPA thu chu ngai ta u;

en: As I live, saith the Lord Jehovah, surely forasmuch as my sheep became a prey, and my sheep became food to all the beasts of the field, because there was no shepherd, neither did my shepherds search for my sheep, but the shepherds fed themselves, and fed not my sheep;
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun, Ka hring zing angin ka berâmhai chu, berâm- puhai an um nawh a, ka berâmpuhai chun ka berâmhai chu an zawng bawk nawh a, berâmpuhai chu anni le anni an inchâwm a, ka berâmhai chu an châwm naw leiin, rama ram- sahai po po bu le an sasehai chu an lo ni ngei chu a ni ta hi;

en: therefore, ye shepherds, hear the word of Jehovah:
hmr: chuleiin, nangni berâmpuhai, LALPA thu chu lo ngai ta u;

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah, Behold, I am against the shepherds; and I will require my sheep at their hand, and cause them to cease from feeding the sheep; neither shall the shepherds feed themselves any more; and I will deliver my sheep from their mouth, that they may not be food for them.
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta, berâmpuhai chu ka dodâl a nih; ka berâmhai chu an kutah lâkpêk ka ta, an berâm châwm chu inmâktir ka tih; anni berâm- puhai khawm chu mâni le mâni inchâwm bîk ta naw bawk an tih; chun, an ta dinga bu an ni nawna dingin ka berâmhai chu an baua inthawk chun la suok ka tih.

en: For thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I myself, even I, will search for my sheep, and will seek them out.
hmr: “Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a ti sih a; Ngai ta, keima ngeiin, keiin ka berâmhai chu zawng ka ta, zawng suok bawk ka tih.

en: As a shepherd seeketh out his flock in the day that he is among his sheep that are scattered abroad, so will I seek out my sheep; and I will deliver them out of all places whither they have been scattered in the cloudy and dark day.
hmr: Berâmpu chun sûnah a berâm ruol chu a zawng a, berâm a lo indarhai laia chun a um hlak angin, ka berâmhai chu zawng suok ka ta; inthim le sûmzîng nia an lo invâk darna hmunhai po poa inthawk chun anni chu zawng suok ka tih.

en: And I will bring them out from the peoples, and gather them from the countries, and will bring them into their own land; and I will feed them upon the mountains of Israel, by the watercourses, and in all the inhabited places of the country.
hmr: Hnamhai laia inthawk chun hung ṭhuoi suok ka ta, rambunghaia inthawk chun kei khâwm ka ta, anni ram ngeia chun ṭhuoi lût ka tih; chun, Israel tlâng chungahai le, tui luongna sîrahai le, chu ram, hluoa a umna hmun po poahai chun anni chu intlattir ka tih.

en: I will feed them with good pasture; and upon the mountains of the height of Israel shall their fold be: there shall they lie down in a good fold; and on fat pasture shall they feed upon the mountains of Israel.
hmr: Hlo pet ding ṭhatak chun anni chu châwm ka ta, Israel insângna tlâng chungahai chun an in chu um a tih; in ṭhatak sûnga chun bawk an ta, Israel tlâng chungahai chun hlo petna hmun tuihnâitaka chun tlâng an tih.

en: I myself will be the shepherd of my sheep, and I will cause them to lie down, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun, Ka be- râmhai chu keima ngeiin châwm ka ta, anni chu inbawktir ka tih, a tih.

en: I will seek that which was lost, and will bring back that which was driven away, and will bind up that which was broken, and will strengthen that which was sick: but the fat and the strong I will destroy; I will feed them in justice.
hmr: A lo inhmang ta chu zawng ka ta, hnawt hmanga lo um ta khawm chu hung ṭhuoikîr nâwk ka tih; sukthlieka um ta chu tuom ka ta, damnawa um khawm chu sukhrât bawk ka tih; a thâu le a hrât chu suksieng ka ta; anni chu rorêlnain châwm ka tih.

en: And as for you, O my flock, thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I judge between sheep and sheep, the rams and the he-goats.
hmr: Chun, nangni thua chu, Aw ka berâm ruol, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta, kêlchalhai le berâmchalhai ang bawkin, ran ruol le ran ruol chunga chun ro ka rêl a.

en: Seemeth it a small thing unto you to have fed upon the good pasture, but ye must tread down with your feet the residue of your pasture? and to have drunk of the clear waters, but ye must foul the residue with your feet?
hmr: Hlo pet ding ṭha hmuna tlat chu in ta ding chun thil chînthamah ân lang thei a, nisienlakhawm, in hlo pet mahlahai chu in kehaiin in sirde naw ding am a nih? Tui inthiengtakhai hang dâwn ding khawm chun a mahla chu in kehai chun in pal siet naw ding am a nih?

en: And as for my sheep, they eat that which ye have trodden with your feet, and they drink that which ye have fouled with your feet.
hmr: Chun, ka berâm ruolhai chun, in kehaia in sir chen ta hnunghai chu an fâk a, in kehaiin a lo pal siet tahai chu an dâwn bawk a ni hi.

en: Therefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah unto them: Behold, I, even I, will judge between the fat sheep and the lean sheep.
hmr: “Chuleichun, Lalpa PATHIEN chun an kuomah hieng hin a hril a: Ngai ta u, Keiin, kei ngeiin, ran ruol thâu le ran ruol chêr inkâra chun ro rêl ka ta.

en: Because ye thrust with side and with shoulder, and push all the diseased with your horns, till ye have scattered them abroad;
hmr: Liengko le sîrin in hneng a, in sukdar phier hmakhat chun in kihai chun a damnawhai chu in sik leiin,

en: therefore will I save my flock, and they shall no more be a prey; and I will judge between sheep and sheep.
hmr: ka berâm ruol chu ka sandam ding a nih, anni chu fâk zoin um nâwk ta naw ni hai a; ran ruol le ran ruol inkâr thu chu ka rêl ding a nih.

en: And I will set up one shepherd over them, and he shall feed them, even my servant David; he shall feed them, and he shall be their shepherd.
hmr: An chunga chun berâmpu pakhat sieng ka ta, ka siehlaw David ngei chu, ama chun anni chu châwm a ta, an ta dingin berâmpu nîng a tih.

en: And I, Jehovah, will be their God, and my servant David prince among them; I, Jehovah, have spoken it.
hmr: Chun, kei LALPA hi in Pathien nîng ka ta, ka siehlaw David chu anni laia lal nîng a tih; hi hi kei LALPAIN ka hril ta a nih.

en: And I will make with them a covenant of peace, and will cause evil beasts to cease out of the land; and they shall dwell securely in the wilderness, and sleep in the woods.
hmr: Anni le inremna thuthlung siem ka ta, rama inthawk chun ramsa rilohai chu inrêmtir vawng ka tih; thlalêra chun himtakin chêng an ta, rampui hnuoia chun zâl an tih.

en: And I will make them and the places round about my hill a blessing; and I will cause the shower to come down in its season; there shall be showers of blessing.
hmr: Chun, ka tlâng sîra hmunhai le anni chu malsâwmah siem ka ta; ruo- hai khawm a huntakah hung insûrtir ka ta; malsâwmna ruopui sûrhai hung um a tih.

en: And the tree of the field shall yield its fruit, and the earth shall yield its increase, and they shall be secure in their land; and they shall know that I am Jehovah, when I have broken the bars of their yoke, and have delivered them out of the hand of those that made bondmen of them.
hmr: Loa thinghai chun ra hung in- suong an ta, leihnuoi khawma a hlâwkna hung insuo bawk a tih; chun, an ram sûnga chun him an ta, an rîngkawl thîrtluonhai ka suktliek a, an rawng an bâwlpêkhai kuta in- thawka ka sansuok pha chun LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.

en: And they shall no more be a prey to the nations, neither shall the beasts of the earth devour them; but they shall dwell securely, and none shall make them afraid.
hmr: Chun, khawhri be mihai ifâk zoin um ta ngai naw ni hai a, hnuoia ramsahai khawma anni chu fa zo bawk naw ni hai; amiruokchu, him- takin chêng an ta, tukhawma anni chu sukṭi ta naw ni hai.

en: And I will raise up unto them a plantation for renown, and they shall be no more consumed with famine in the land, neither bear the shame of the nations any more.
hmr: Anni lai chun hming inthang khawp thilphun inmâwngtir ka ta, chu rama chun ṭâm ifâk zoin um ta naw ni hai a, hnam danghai biekrâwpna chu tuor ta bawk naw nihai.

en: And they shall know that I, Jehovah, their God am with them, and that they, the house of Israel, are my people, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, kei LALPA an Pathien chu an kuomah ka um a, anni, Israel sûngkuo chu, ka mihai an nih ti hre tâng an tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

en: And ye my sheep, the sheep of my pasture, are men, and I am your God, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, nangni ka berâmhai, ka hlo petna hmuna berâmhai chu mihriemhai hi in na; chun, kei in Pathien chu ka nih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih,” tiin.

en: Moreover the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chu nawa khawm chun LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a:

en: Son of man, set thy face against mount Seir, and prophesy against it,
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, Seir tlâng chu i hmai innghat la, a chunga chun thu hril la,

en: and say unto it, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I am against thee, O mount Seir, and I will stretch out my hand against thee, and I will make thee a desolation and an astonishment.
hmr: a kuoma chun hieng hin ti rawh: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta, nang chu ka dodâl cheh a, aw Seir tlâng, i chunga chun ka kut kân let ding a nih; chun, nang chu râu- sana le maktiah ka siem ding che a nih.

en: I will lay thy cities waste, and thou shalt be desolate; and thou shalt know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: I khawpuihai chu suksietin in- umtir ka ta, nang khawm râusanin um i tih; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng i tih.

en: Because thou hast had a perpetual enmity, and hast given over the children of Israel to the power of the sword in the time of their calamity, in the time of the iniquity of the end;
hmr: Hun tâwpa hremna huna, an vângsiet lai hunah Israel thlahai chu kâwlhnâm thilthawtheina kuoma i lo pêk a, anni chu hmêlmâkna rê lo i nei leiin;

en: therefore, as I live, saith the Lord Jehovah, I will prepare thee unto blood, and blood shall pursue thee: since thou hast not hated blood, therefore blood shall pursue thee.
hmr: ka hring zing angin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: thisen ta dingin buotsai ka ti cheh a, thisen chun hnawt a ti che; thisen chu i theida naw leiin, thisen chun hnawt a ti che.

en: Thus will I make mount Seir an astonishment and a desolation; and I will cut off from it him that passeth through and him that returneth.
hmr: Chuongchun, Seir tlâng chu râu- san le maktia um dingin siem ka ta; chun, amaa inthawk chun a fethleng hlaktu le, a kîr hlaktu chu sât thlâng ka tih.

en: And I will fill its mountains with its slain: in thy hills and in thy valleys and in all thy watercourses shall they fall that are slain with the sword.
hmr: I tlânghai chu a mi thathai chun suksip ka ta; i muolahai, i phairuom- ahai le i tui luongnahaia chun kâwl- hnâma thata umhai chu tlûng an tih.

en: I will make thee a perpetual desolation, and thy cities shall not be inhabited; and ye shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Kumkhuoa râusanah siem ka ta, i khawpuihai chu hluo ni nâwk ta ngai naw nih; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng i tih.

en: Because thou hast said, These two nations and these two countries shall be mine, and we will possess it; whereas Jehovah was there:
hmr: “Nang chun, ‘Hi hnam hnihai le hi ram pahnihai hi ka ta nîng a ta, nei ka tih,’ i ti leiin, chutaka chun LALPA chu a um a,

en: therefore, as I live, saith the Lord Jehovah, I will do according to thine anger, and according to thine envy which thou hast showed out of thy hatred against them; and I will make myself known among them, when I shall judge thee.
hmr: chuleiin, ka hring zing angin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; an chunga i lo inentir tah, anni i thîkna ang pei le, i lunginsenna hu ang peiin ka thaw ding a nih; i chungthu ka rêl pha chun, anni laia chun an mi hriet dingin insiem ka tih.

en: And thou shalt know that I, Jehovah, have heard all thy revilings which thou hast spoken against the mountains of Israel, saying, They are laid desolate, they are given us to devour.
hmr: Chuongchun, ‘Suksietin an um tah a, ei kuomah fâk zo el dingin pêkin an um ta a ni hi,’ tiha Israel tlânghai chunga thu i lo hril a, anni i lo demnahai po po chu kei LALPA hin ka hriet vawng a nih, ti hre tâng i tih.

en: And ye have magnified yourselves against me with your mouth, and have multiplied your words against me: I have heard it.
hmr: Chun, i bauin keia chungah nang le nang în chawimawi a, ka chunga i thuhrilhai i sukpung a; ka hriet a nih.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: When the whole earth rejoiceth, I will make thee desolate.
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a ti a nih: Leihnuoi pumpui chu a hlim pha chun, nang chu râusanah siem ka ti che.

en: As thou didst rejoice over the inheritance of the house of Israel, because it was desolate, so will I do unto thee: thou shalt be desolate, O mount Seir, and all Edom, even all of it; and they shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Râusan a ni leia Israel sûngkuo rochan chunga chun i lo hlim ta ang khan, i chungah chuong ang tak chun ka thaw ding a nih; Aw Seir tlâng, Edom tlâng po po, a rêng elin, râusan nîng in tih; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.

en: And thou, son of man, prophesy unto the mountains of Israel, and say, Ye mountains of Israel, hear the word of Jehovah.
hmr: “Chun, nang mihriem naupa, Israel tlânghai chungah thu hril la, hieng hin hril rawh, Nangni Israel tlânghai, LALPA thu chu hre ro.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Because the enemy hath said against you, Aha! and, The ancient high places are ours in possession;
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Hmêlma chun i chunga chun, ‘I hi! tienlaia bâwlhmunhai chu ei ta a ni tah,’ an ti khum che leiin;

en: therefore prophesy, and say, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Because, even because they have made you desolate, and swallowed you up on every side, that ye might be a possession unto the residue of the nations, and ye are taken up in the lips of talkers, and the evil report of the people;
hmr: hril la, hieng hin ti rawh; Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a ti a nih; râusanah an lo siem ta che leiin le, sîr tina inthawk chun an lo lem ta cheh a, hnam la umhai ta dinga chan i ni theina dingin, thuhriltuhai hmûra chun i chuong a, mipuihai thuhril ṭha lo i lo ni tâk leiin;

en: therefore, ye mountains of Israel, hear the word of the Lord Jehovah: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah to the mountains and to the hills, to the watercourses and to the valleys, to the desolate wastes and to the cities that are forsaken, which are become a prey and derision to the residue of the nations that are round about;
hmr: nangni Israel tlânghai, Lalpa PATHIEN thu chu lo ngai ta u; Tlâng- hai kuoma dâm, muolhai kuoma dâm, tui luongnahai kuoma dâm, phai- ruom kuoma dâm, khawpui mâksana um le suksieta râusana umhai kuoma dâm, an sîrvêla hnamhai la um sun- hai ifâk zo le hrilsîma lo um tahai kuoma chun, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a ti a nih;

en: therefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Surely in the fire of my jealousy have I spoken against the residue of the nations, and against all Edom, that have appointed my land unto themselves for a possession with the joy of all their heart, with despite of soul, to cast it out for a prey.
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Matheiloin, hnam la um sunhai chunga le, Edom po po chungah ka thîkna meiin thu hril ngei ka ta; anni chun an lungril inhawi ti zâwng ang po poa nei dingin lungrila hmusitna le, fâk zoa um dinga pei suok el dingin ka ram chu an lo ruot tah a.

en: Therefore prophesy concerning the land of Israel, and say unto the mountains and to the hills, to the watercourses and to the valleys, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I have spoken in my jealousy and in my wrath, because ye have borne the shame of the nations:
hmr: “Chuleichun, Israel ram chung- châng thua chun thu hril la, tlânghai kuoma dâm, muolhai kuoma dâm, tui luongnahai kuoma dâm, phairuom- hai kuoma dâm chun hril la; Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng ang hin a tih; Ngai ta, hnam danghai biekrâwpna chu i lo phur tâk leiin, ka lunginsenna le ka itthîknain thu ka lo hril tah a;

en: therefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah: I have sworn, saying, Surely the nations that are round about you, they shall bear their shame.
hmr: chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Khawhri be mihai nangni vêla umhai po po chun anni biekrâwpna anni ngeiin an phur ngei ding a nih, tiin, ka bân ka lo phar tah a.

en: But ye, O mountains of Israel, ye shall shoot forth your branches, and yield your fruit to my people Israel; for they are at hand to come.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, nangni, Aw Israel tlânghai, in kauhai chu in- zâmdawktir in ta, in rahai chu ka mi Israelhai in pêk ding a nih; hung nghâl el ding an ni sih a.

en: For, behold, I am for you, and I will turn unto you, and ye shall be tilled and sown;
hmr: Ngai ta u, kei chu in ta ding ka ni sih a; in kuomah hung kîr ka ta, chun, inlet le chîng nîng in tih;

en: and I will multiply men upon you, all the house of Israel, even all of it; and the cities shall be inhabited, and the waste places shall be builded;
hmr: chun, nangniah mihai, Israel sûngkuo po po chu, an rêng elin, sukpung ka ta, khawpuihai chu hluoin um an ta, hmun suksieta um tahai khawm chu siem nîng an tih;

en: and I will multiply upon you man and beast; and they shall increase and be fruitful; and I will cause you to be inhabited after your former estate, and will do better unto you than at your beginnings: and ye shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: in sûnga chun mihriem le sa khawm sukpung ka ta; pung an ta, ra hlâwk an tih; chun, a hmaa in lo um dân pângngai ang bawk khan hluoa um dingin siem ka ti che a, in um ṭantir lai nêk hman khan in chungah thaw ṭha lem ka tih; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng in tih.

en: Yea, I will cause men to walk upon you, even my people Israel; and they shall possess thee, and thou shalt be their inheritance, and thou shalt no more henceforth bereave them of children.
hmr: Anih, in chunga chun mihai inlâwntir ka ta, ka mi Israelhai ngei chun nei an ti cheh a, nang chu an rochan hung nîng i tih; chuong- chun, chu chena inthawk chu an thlahai chu thisanin inumtir ta naw ti ni.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Because they say unto you, Thou land art a devourer of men, and hast been a bereaver of thy nation;
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: I kuoma chun, ‘Nang ram mi- hriem fa zotu i na, i hnamhai chu sukrêmtu i nih,’ an ti che leiin,

en: therefore thou shalt devour men no more, neither bereave thy nation any more, saith the Lord Jehovah;
hmr: chuleiin, mihriem hrim hrim chu fa zo ta ngai naw ti nih a, i hnamhai khawm chu sukrêm ta ngai bawk naw ti ni, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih;

en: neither will I let thee hear any more the shame of the nations, neither shalt thou bear the reproach of the peoples any more, neither shalt thou cause thy nation to stumble any more, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: chun, hnamhai inzakna chu inhriettir ta ngai bawk naw ning cheh a, hnamhai kâwkna chu phur ngai ta bawk naw ti ni; chun, i hnamhai chu insuithlu dingin siem nâwk ta ngai bawk naw ti ni, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih,” tiin.

en: Moreover the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chu nawa khawm chun LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a.

en: Son of man, when the house of Israel dwelt in their own land, they defiled it by their way and by their doings: their way before me was as the uncleanness of a woman in her impurity.
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, Israel sûng- kuo chu anni ram ngeia an chêng lai khan, an thil thawhai le an lampuihai chun an sukpawrcheh a; an lampui chu ka kuoma chun nuhmei ân siehran laia ân thieng nawna ang chu a nih.

en: Wherefore I poured out my wrath upon them for the blood which they had poured out upon the land, and because they had defiled it with their idols;
hmr: Chuleiin, ram chunga an lo bunthlâk thisen chunga chun ka lunginsenna chu ka bunthlâk a; an milimhaia an lo sukpawrche ta leiin;

en: and I scattered them among the nations, and they were dispersed through the countries: according to their way and according to their doings I judged them.
hmr: hnamhai laia chun ka sukdar tah a, rambunghaia chun an lo indar tah a; an um dân ang pei le, an thil thawhai ang peiin an chunga chun ro ka rêl a.

en: And when they came unto the nations, whither they went, they profaned my holy name; in that men said of them, These are the people of Jehovah, and are gone forth out of his land.
hmr: Chun, hnamhai laia an hung chun, an fena tieng tieng ka hming inthieng chu an sukpawrcheh a; chu- taka chun mihai chun, ‘Hienghai hi LALPA mihai chu an na, a rama inthawka suokhai chu an nih,’ an tih a.

en: But I had regard for my holy name, which the house of Israel had profaned among the nations, whither they went.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, Israel sûng- kuohaiin an fena tieng tienga an sukpawrche tah, ka hming inthieng chu ka lunginsiet a.

en: Therefore say unto the house of Israel, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: I do not this for your sake, O house of Israel, but for my holy name, which ye have profaned among the nations, whither ye went.
hmr: “Chuleiin, Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun hieng hin hril la; Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Aw Israel sûngkuo, hi hi nangni leia thaw ka ni nawh a, amiruokchu, ka hming inthieng, in fena tieng tienga hnam- hai laia in lo sukpawrche ta lei khan a ni lem.

en: And I will sanctify my great name, which hath been profaned among the nations, which ye have profaned in the midst of them; and the nations shall know that I am Jehovah, saith the Lord Jehovah, when I shall be sanctified in you before their eyes.
hmr: Chun, ka hming ropuitak chu, hnamhai laia sukpawrchea lo um tah, anni laia in lo sukpawrche ta chu sukthieng ka ta; chuongchun, hnam- hai chun LALPA chu ka nih, ti mi hre tâng an tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih; an mithmua nangnia sukthienga ka um pha chun.

en: For I will take you from among the nations, and gather you out of all the countries, and will bring you into your own land.
hmr: Hnamhai laia inthawk chun ṭhuoi ka ti cheu a, rambung po poa inthawkin kei khâwm ka ti cheu a, in rama ngei chun ṭhuoi ka ti cheu.

en: And I will sprinkle clean water upon you, and ye shall be clean: from all your filthiness, and from all your idols, will I cleanse you.
hmr: Tui inthieng chu thinkhum ka ti cheu a, inthieng tâng in tih; in in- thiengnawna po poa inthawk le in milimhai po poa inthawkin sukthieng ka ti cheu.

en: A new heart also will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you; and I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh, and I will give you a heart of flesh.
hmr: Lungril thar pêng ka ti cheu a, thlarau thar nangniah sie bawk ka tih; chun, in tisaa inthawkin lungril lung ang chu la hmang ka ta, tisa lungril innêm pe lem ka ti cheu.

en: And I will put my Spirit within you, and cause you to walk in my statutes, and ye shall keep mine ordinances, and do them.
hmr: Nangnia chun ka thlarau sieng ka ta, ka thuruothai chu inhrawtir ka ti cheu a, ka thupêkhai chu zâwm in ta, thaw bawk in tih.

en: And ye shall dwell in the land that I gave to your fathers; and ye shall be my people, and I will be your God.
hmr: In thlatuhai kuoma ram ka pêka chun chêng in ta, nangni chu ka mihai nîng in ta, kei khawm in Pathien nîng ka tih.

en: And I will save you from all your uncleannesses: and I will call for the grain, and will multiply it, and lay no famine upon you.
hmr: Chun, in inthiengnawna po poa inthawkin sandam ka ti cheu a, chun, bu ko ka ta, sukpung ka ta, in chung- ah ṭâm inumtir naw ningah.

en: And I will multiply the fruit of the tree, and the increase of the field, that ye may receive no more the reproach of famine among the nations.
hmr: Thing rahai le hnuoi ra hlâwk- hai chu sukpung ka ta, hnamhai laia chun ṭâm leia deusâwna tuok ta ngai naw ti niu.

en: Then shall ye remember your evil ways, and your doings that were not good; and ye shall loathe yourselves in your own sight for your iniquities and for your abominations.
hmr: Chun, in lampui rilohai le, in thilthaw ṭha nawhai chu hre zing in ta; chuongchun, in tirdakumnahai le in suolnahai leiin in mithmu ngeia chun nangni le nangni chu inten in tih.

en: Nor for your sake do I this, saith the Lord Jehovah, be it known unto you: be ashamed and confounded for your ways, O house of Israel.
hmr: Hi thil hi nangni leia thaw ka ni nawh ti hi nangni ihriet ni raw se, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih; aw Israel sûngkuo, in um dânhaia chun buoi unla, inzak ro.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: In the day that I cleanse you from all your iniquities, I will cause the cities to be inhabited, and the waste places shall be builded.
hmr: “Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; In suolnahai po poa in- thawka ka sukthieng ni cheu chun, khawpuihai chu hluoa um dingin siem ka ta, hmun se tahai khawm chu bâwl nîng an tih.

en: And the land that was desolate shall be tilled, whereas it was a desolation in the sight of all that passed by.
hmr: A fethlengtuhai mithmua râu- sana a lo um ta angin, ram râusana lo um ta khawm chu inlet nîng a ta.

en: And they shall say, This land that was desolate is become like the garden of Eden; and the waste and desolate and ruined cities are fortified and inhabited.
hmr: Anni chun, ‘Ram râusana lo um ta hi, Eden huon ang a hung ni nâwk a; khawpui se tah, suksieta um taha râusana um tahai khawm chu hluo an ni tah,’ tîng an tih.

en: Then the nations that are left round about you shall know that I, Jehovah, have builded the ruined places, and planted that which was desolate: I, Jehovah, have spoken it, and I will do it.
hmr: Chun, nangni vêla hnam mâk- sana la umhai po po chun kei LALPA ngei hin hmun se tahai chu ka bâwlin, râusana um tahai khawm ka tungding a nih ti hre tâng an tih; kei LALPA ngeiin ka hril tah a, thaw bawk ka tih.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: For this, moreover, will I be inquired of by the house of Israel, to do it for them: I will increase them with men like a flock.
hmr: “Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Hi hi dinga khawm hin, an ta dinga thawpêk dingin, Israel sûng- kuo mi râwnin um bawk ka tih; anni chu berâm ruol angin mihriem sukpung ka tih.

en: As the flock for sacrifice, as the flock of Jerusalem in her appointed feasts, so shall the waste cities be filled with flocks of men; and they shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Inthawina dinga berâm ruol ang, a ruoiṭhena hun bia Jerusalema berâm ruol angin, khawpui se ta- hnunghai chu mihriema suksip nîng an ta, chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih,” tiin.

en: The hand of Jehovah was upon me, and he brought me out in the Spirit of Jehovah, and set me down in the midst of the valley; and it was full of bones.
hmr: LALPA kut chu ka chungah a um a, LALPA thlarau chun a mi ṭhuoi suok a, phairuoma hin a mi sie tah a; rua sip a na;

en: And he caused me to pass by them round about: and, behold, there were very many in the open valley; and, lo, they were very dry.
hmr: chun, anni lai chun a mi ṭhuoi vêl a; ngai ta, phairuom âwla chun a tama tam hi an um a; ngai ta, an ṭâwl tâwl khawp el a.

en: And he said unto me, Son of man, can these bones live? And I answered, O Lord Jehovah, thou knowest.
hmr: Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, hieng ruhai hi hring thei an ti?” a ta. Chun, “Aw Lalpa PATHIEN, nangin i hriet,” tiin, ka dawn a.

en: Again he said unto me, Prophesy over these bones, and say unto them, O ye dry bones, hear the word of Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Hieng ruhai chunga hin thu hril la, an kuoma chun, ‘Aw nangni ru ṭâwlhai, LALPA thu chu lo ngai ta u,’ ti rawh.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah unto these bones: Behold, I will cause breath to enter into you, and ye shall live.
hmr: Hieng ruhai kuoma hin Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta u, nangniah thuok inlûttir ka ta, hung hring in tih.

en: And I will lay sinews upon you, and will bring up flesh upon you, and cover you with skin, and put breath in you, and ye shall live; and ye shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Nangnia chun thahai sieng ka ta, taksain in chungah hung sukbit ka tih, chun, vunin inkhum ka ti cheu, nangnia chun thuok sieng ka ta hung hring in tih; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng in tih,” a ta.

en: So I prophesied as I was commanded: and as I prophesied, there was a noise, and, behold, an earthquake; and the bones came together, bone to its bone.
hmr: Chuongchun, thu pêk ka ni ang chun thu chu ka hril tah a; chuonga thu ka hang hril chun ri a hung um a, ngai ta, simkhawlei a hung inhnîng a, ruhai chu mâni zawmpui sengah an hung fe khâwm tah a.

en: And I beheld, and, lo, there were sinews upon them, and flesh came up, and skin covered them above; but there was no breath in them.
hmr: Chun, ka hei en a, ngai ta, an chungahai chun thahruihai chu a um a, taksa chu a hung insukbit a, a chunga chun vun chun ân khum tah a; nisienlakhawm, anniahai chun thuok chu a la um nawh a.

en: Then said he unto me, Prophesy unto the wind, prophesy, son of man, and say to the wind, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Come from the four winds, O breath, and breathe upon these slain, that they may live.
hmr: Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Thli kuomah thu hril la, thu hril la, mihriem naupa, thli kuoma chun, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: ‘Aw thli, hnuoi kil lia inthawk chun hung la, hieng thata umhai chunga hin hung inthli rawh, an hring theina dingin,’ tiin,” a ta.

en: So I prophesied as he commanded me, and the breath came into them, and they lived, and stood up upon their feet, an exceeding great army.
hmr: Chuongchun, thu a mi pêk ang chun thu chu ka hril tah a, chun, thli chu annia chun a hung lût a, an hring tah a, an kein, sipai pâwl nasa êm êm el angin an hung ngîr suok tah a.

en: Then he said unto me, Son of man, these bones are the whole house of Israel: behold, they say, Our bones are dried up, and our hope is lost; we are clean cut off.
hmr: Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Mi- hriem naupa, hieng ruhai hi Israel sûngkuohai po po chu an na, ngai ta, anni chun, ‘Ei ruhai hlak a ṭâwl zo tah a, ei beisei hlak a bo dêr tah a; sât thlâk fiṭhuoi ei ni ta a ni hi,’ an tih a.

en: Therefore prophesy, and say unto them, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I will open your graves, and cause you to come up out of your graves, O my people; and I will bring you into the land of Israel.
hmr: Chuleiin, thu hril la, an kuomah hieng hin ti rawh: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta u, in thlânhai chu hung hawng ka ta, in thlânhaia inthawk chun hung in- suoktir ka ti cheu, aw ka mihai; chun, Israel rama chun ṭhuoi ka ti cheu.

en: And ye shall know that I am Jehovah, when I have opened your graves, and caused you to come up out of your graves, O my people.
hmr: Chun, aw ka mihai, in thlânhai chu ka hung hawng a, in thlânhaia inthawka kân suoktir pha cheu chun LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng in tih.

en: And I will put my Spirit in you, and ye shall live, and I will place you in your own land: and ye shall know that I, Jehovah, have spoken it and performed it, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Nangnia chun ka thlarau chu sieng ka ta, hring in tih; chun, nangni ram ngeia chun sieng ka ti cheu a; kei LALPA ngeiin ka lo hril tah a, thaw khawm ka thaw a nih, ti hre tâng in tih, LALPA chun a tih, tiin,” a ta.

en: The word of Jehovah came again unto me, saying,
hmr: Chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung nâwk a:

en: And thou, son of man, take thee one stick, and write upon it, For Judah, and for the children of Israel his companions: then take another stick, and write upon it, For Joseph, the stick of Ephraim, and for all the house of Israel his companions:
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, nangin hmawl pakhat la la, a chunga chun ziek la, ‘Juda ta ding le, Israel thlahai a pâwlhai ta ding,’ tiin. Chun, hmawl dang la nâwk la, a chunga chun ziek la, ‘Josef Ephraim hmawl ding le, a pâwlhai Israel sûngkuo ta dingin,’ tiin.

en: and join them for thee one to another into one stick, that they may become one in thy hand.
hmr: Chun, nanga ta dingin hmawl pakhata chun zawm la, hmawl pakhat angin, i kuta chun pakhat an ni theina dingin.

en: And when the children of thy people shall speak unto thee, saying, Wilt thou not show us what thou meanest by these?
hmr: Chun, i chipuihai thlahai chun i kuomah, ‘Hi ieng i tina am a na, i mîn entir naw ding maw?’ an ti pha chun,

en: say unto them, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I will take the stick of Joseph, which is in the hand of Ephraim, and the tribes of Israel his companions; and I will put them with it, even with the stick of Judah, and make them one stick, and they shall be one in my hand.
hmr: an kuoma chun, ‘Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta u, Ephraim le, a pâwlhai Israel hnamhai kuta um Josef hmawl chu lâng ka ta, Juda hmawl le ngei chun anni chu sie kawp ka ta, hmawl pakhatah siem ka ta, ka kuta chun pakhat nîng an tih’, a tih, ti rawh.

en: And the sticks whereon thou writest shall be in thy hand before their eyes.
hmr: Chun, hmawl a chunga i ziekhai chu an mithmua ngei chun i kutah an um ding a nih.

en: And say unto them, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I will take the children of Israel from among the nations, whither they are gone, and will gather them on every side, and bring them into their own land:
hmr: Chun, an kuoma chun, ‘Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta u, hnamhai an lo fe hmang ta nahai laia inthawkin Israel thlahai chu lâng ka ta, kil tina inthawkin ṭhuoi khâwm ka ta, anni ram ngeia chun hung ṭhuoi ka ta;

en: and I will make them one nation in the land, upon the mountains of Israel; and one king shall be king to them all; and they shall be no more two nations, neither shall they be divided into two kingdoms any more at all;
hmr: chu rama chun Israel tlânghai chunga chun anni chu hnam khatah siem ka tih; chun, lal pakhat an rênga lal nîng a ta; hnam hni ni ta naw ni hai a, lalram pahnia khawm inṭhe bawk ta naw ni hai;

en: neither shall they defile themselves any more with their idols, nor with their detestable things, nor with any of their transgressions; but I will save them out of all their dwelling-places, wherein they have sinned, and will cleanse them: so shall they be my people, and I will be their God.
hmr: Anni chu an milimhai chun insukpawrche ta ngai naw ni hai a, an thil pawrchehai hrim hrim khawm chun, an bawsietnahai chun insuk- pawrche ta bawk naw ni hai; an umna hmun po po, an hnungtawlna, an lo suol tâkna hmunhaia chun anni chu sandam ka ta, sukthieng bawk ka tih; chuongchun, ka mihai nîng an ta, kei khawm an Pathien nîng ka tih.

en: And my servant David shall be king over them; and they all shall have one shepherd: they shall also walk in mine ordinances, and observe my statutes, and do them.
hmr: Chun, ka siehlaw David chu an chunga lal nîng a ta, chuongchun, berampu pakhat nei an ta, ka rorêl- hai khawm chu hrâwng an ta, ka thuruothai chu pawmin thaw bawk an tih.

en: And they shall dwell in the land that I have given unto Jacob my servant, wherein your fathers dwelt; and they shall dwell therein, they, and their children, and their children’s children, for ever: and David my servant shall be their prince for ever.
hmr: Ka siehlaw Jakob kuoma ram ka pêk, in thlatuhai chêngnaa khan chêng an ta; chutaka chun kumkhuoa dingin chêng an ta, anni le an nauhai leh, an nauhai nauhai leh; chun, ka siehlaw David chu kumkhuoa dingin an lal nîng a tih.

en: Moreover I will make a covenant of peace with them; it shall be an everlasting covenant with them; and I will place them, and multiply them, and will set my sanctuary in the midst of them for evermore.
hmr: Chu nawa khawm chun anni le chun inremna thuthlung siem ka ta, anni le chatuona thuthlung nîng a tih; chun, anni chu sieng ka ta, suk- pung ka ta, anni laia chun ka hmun inthieng chu kumkhawtluongin sie tâng ka tih.

en: My tabernacle also shall be with them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.
hmr: Ka biekbûk khawm chu anni lai chun um a ta, an Pathien nîng ka ta, anni chu ka mihai nîng an tih.

en: And the nations shall know that I am Jehovah that sanctifieth Israel, when my sanctuary shall be in the midst of them for evermore.
hmr: Chun, kumkhawtluonga, anni laia ka hmun inthieng chu a um pha chun hnamhai chun kei LALPA hin Israel chu ka sukthieng a nih ti mi hre tâng an tih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.

en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a:

en: Son of man, set thy face toward Gog, of the land of Magog, the prince of Rosh, Meshech, and Tubal, and prophesy against him,
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, Ros, Mesek le Tubal hai hotu tak Magog rama Gog tieng ngha la, a chunga chun thu hril la,

en: and say, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I am against thee, O Gog, prince of Rosh, Meshech, and Tubal:
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta, Aw Gog, Ros, Mesek le Tubal hai hotu tak, nang ka dodâl che a nih;

en: and I will turn thee about, and put hooks into thy jaws, and I will bring thee forth, and all thine army, horses and horsemen, all of them clothed in full armor, a great company with buckler and shield, all of them handling swords:
hmr: i hnung innghattir ka ti cheh a, i khâkruhaia chun ngakuoihai kuoi ka ta, nang le i sipai pâwl po po, kâwl- hnâm hmangtuhai po po, âwmphaw le phaw hmanga pâwl nasatakhai leh, râlthuom famkima inthuomhai po po le, sakawrhai le i sakawr chung chuong mihai po po leh ka khai dawk ding cheu a nih,

en: Persia, Cush, and Put with them, all of them with shield and helmet;
hmr: anni lai chun Persia le Kus le Put an ṭhang veh a; an rêngin thîr lukhum le phaw hmangin;

en: Gomer, and all his hordes; the house of Togarmah in the uttermost parts of the north, and all his hordes; even many peoples with thee.
hmr: Gomer le a rawihai po po leh; chun, a hmârtieng tâwptaka chun Togarma sûngkuohai le a rawihai po po leh; hnam tamtakhai chu nang le ṭhang an nih.

en: Be thou prepared, yea, prepare thyself, thou, and all thy companies that are assembled unto thee, and be thou a guard unto them.
hmr: Inbuotsai la, anih, nangma chu inbuotsai la, pâwlhai nanga kuoma hung inkhawmhai po po chunga chun nang chu a vêngtu ni la.

en: After many days thou shalt be visited: in the latter years thou shalt come into the land that is brought back from the sword, that is gathered out of many peoples, upon the mountains of Israel, which have been a continual waste; but it is brought forth out of the peoples, and they shall dwell securely, all of them.
hmr: Ni tamtak hnunga chun ko khâwm ning i ta, kum nuhnungahai chun indonaa inthawka sansuok, hnam tamtakhaia inthawka lâk khâwmhai umna ram, Israel tlâng- hai, râusana um zing zing el chu hung tlung i tih; anni chu hnamhai laia inthawka lâk suok an na, an rêng chun himtakin an chêng ding a nih.

en: And thou shalt ascend, thou shalt come like a storm, thou shalt be like a cloud to cover the land, thou, and all thy hordes, and many peoples with thee.
hmr: Nang chu hang fêng i ta, thlipui angin hung i ta; chun, nang le, i pâwlhai po po le, hnam tamtak nang- ma kuoma umhai chu chu ram in- khumtu sûmpui ang chu nîng in tih.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: It shall come to pass in that day, that things shall come into thy mind, and thou shalt devise an evil device:
hmr: “Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a ti a nih: Chu ni chun chuong chu hung tlung a ta, thilhai chu i lungrila chun hung lût a ta, ngairuotna rilo ngairuot i ta,

en: and thou shalt say, I will go up to the land of unwalled villages; I will go to them that are at rest, that dwell securely, all of them dwelling without walls, and having neither bars nor gates;
hmr: khuohai kul neiloa an umna rama chun hang fêng ka ta, to ṭawk ṭawka chênghai, himtaka chênghai kuoma chun; an rêngin kul neiloin an chêng a, dai kawtkhârhai le kalna thîrtluonhai boin;

en: to take the spoil and to take the prey; to turn thy hand against the waste places that are now inhabited, and against the people that are gathered out of the nations, that have gotten cattle and goods, that dwell in the middle of the earth.
hmr: Râllâk sumhai la ding le, râlhai man ding le, tuta hluoa um tah hmun se tahai le, hnamhaia inthawka mi- pui lâk suokhai, hnuoi lailia chênga ran ruolhai le thuomhnawhai neia khawsahai chunga chun kut inlet dingin fêng ka tih, tîng i ta.

en: Sheba, and Dedan, and the merchants of Tarshish, with all the young lions thereof, shall say unto thee, Art thou come to take the spoil? hast thou assembled thy company to take the prey? to carry away silver and gold, to take away cattle and goods, to take great spoil?
hmr: Seba le Dedan le, Tarsis sum- dâwng mihai le, chutaka sakeibaknei tuoihai chun i kuomah, ‘Râllâk sum- hai chu la dinga hung am i nih? Râl chu man dingin i pâwlhai chu i kei khâwm ta am a nih? Rângkachak le tangka dâm phur hmang ding le, ran ruolhai chu ṭhuoi hmanga, thuom- hnawhai chu la hmang a, râllâk sum nasatak el la ding chun?’ tîng an ti cheh a.

en: Therefore, son of man, prophesy, and say unto Gog, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: In that day when my people Israel dwelleth securely, shalt thou not know it?
hmr: “Chuleiin, mihriem naupa, thu hril la, Gog kuoma chun hieng hin ti rawh, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Ka mi Israelhai hi himtaka an chêng nia chun, i hriet naw ding maw?

en: And thou shalt come from thy place out of the uttermost parts of the north, thou, and many peoples with thee, all of them riding upon horses, a great company and a mighty army;
hmr: Hmârtieng kil khâwra hmun- haia inthawk chun hung i ta, nang le i kuoma mi tamtak leh, anni chu an rêngin sakawr chunga chuong, pâwl ropuitak, sipai pâwl thilthawtheitak nîng an ta;

en: and thou shalt come up against my people Israel, as a cloud to cover the land: it shall come to pass in the latter days, that I will bring thee against my land, that the nations may know me, when I shall be sanctified in thee, O Gog, before their eyes.
hmr: ka mi Israelhai chu hung do i ta, sûmpuiin ram a hung tuom ding ang elin; chun, ni nuhnungahai chun aw Gog, an mithmu ngeia nang- maa sukthienga ka um phaa hnam tamtakhai chun an mi hriet theina dingin, ka ram chu indodâl tir ka ti che.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Art thou he of whom I spake in old time by my servants the prophets of Israel, that prophesied in those days for many years that I would bring thee against them?
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: ka siehlaw Israel zâwlneihaiin kum tamtaka chun anni indotir ka ti che tia chuong nihaia an lo hril, tienlaia a chanchin an lo hril hlak kha i ni naw am a nih?

en: And it shall come to pass in that day, when Gog shall come against the land of Israel, saith the Lord Jehovah, that my wrath shall come up into my nostrils.
hmr: “Gog chun Israel ram chu a hung do pha, chu nia chun, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih; Ka ṭiumna chu ka hnârkuoa inthawkin khu suok a tih.

en: For in my jealousy and in the fire of my wrath have I spoken, Surely in that day there shall be a great shaking in the land of Israel;
hmr: Ka îtthîkna le ka lunginsen lai chun ka hril ta sih a: Matheiloin, chu ni chun Israel rama chun inhnîngna nasatak um a ta,

en: so that the fishes of the sea, and the birds of the heavens, and the beasts of the field, and all creeping things that creep upon the earth, and all the men that are upon the face of the earth, shall shake at my presence, and the mountains shall be thrown down, and the steep places shall fall, and every wall shall fall to the ground.
hmr: chuongchun, tuisuorieta ngahai dâm, chunglêng vatehai dâm, rama ramsahai dâm, hnuoi chunga bawk- vâka invâk thilhringhai po po dâm, hnuoi phêk chunga mihriem umhai po po dâm, ka hmaihmaa chun inthin an ta, tlânghai chu pei thlûkin um an ta, hmun inṭênhai chu tlathlâng an ta, kulbang tinhai chu hnuoiah tlâng an tih.

en: And I will call for a sword against him unto all my mountains, saith the Lord Jehovah: every man’s sword shall be against his brother.
hmr: Ka tlânghai po po kuoma chun, ama do dingin kâwlhnâm ko ka ta, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih; mi tin kâwlhnâm chu a unau chungah um a tih.

en: And with pestilence and with blood will I enter into judgment with him; and I will rain upon him, and upon his hordes, and upon the many peoples that are with him, an overflowing shower, and great hailstones, fire, and brimstone.
hmr: Ama chu thisen le hripuiin do ka ta; chun, ama le a pâwlhai le ama kuoma mipui tamtak umhai chunga chun ruopui vânâwnin, ṭêk le mei le meitâwklungin sûr ka ta.

en: And I will magnify myself, and sanctify myself, and I will make myself known in the eyes of many nations; and they shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, kei le kei inchawimawiin, insukthieng ka ta, hnam tamtakhai mithmua chun kei chu insukhmêl- hriet ka ta; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.

en: And thou, son of man, prophesy against Gog, and say, Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I am against thee, O Gog, prince of Rosh, Meshech, and Tubal:
hmr: “Chun, nang, mihriem naupa, Gog chunga chun thu hril rawh, hieng hin ti la, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Aw Gog, Ros le, Mesek le, Tubal hotutak nang ka dodâl che a nih;

en: and I will turn thee about, and will lead thee on, and will cause thee to come up from the uttermost parts of the north; and I will bring thee upon the mountains of Israel;
hmr: nang chu i hnung tieng in- nghattir ka ti cheh a, ṭhuoi ka ti cheh a, hmârtieng kilkhâwr tak hmunhaia inthawk chun hung insuoktir ka ti che a, Israel tlânghai chunga chun ṭhuoi ka ti che;

en: and I will smite thy bow out of thy left hand, and will cause thine arrows to fall out of thy right hand.
hmr: i vawitienga i thalngul chu lâk- pêk ka ti cheh a, i kut changtienga inthawkin i thalhai chu intlâktir ka tih.

en: Thou shalt fall upon the mountains of Israel, thou, and all thy hordes, and the peoples that are with thee: I will give thee unto the ravenous birds of every sort, and to the beasts of the field to be devoured.
hmr: Israel tlânghai chunga chun tlûng i ta; nang le i pâwlhai po po le, hnam tamtak nanga kuoma umhai le chun, chun, fâk zo dingin vate chi tin phîngṭâmhai le rama ramsahai kuoma chun pêng ka ti che.

en: Thou shalt fall upon the open field; for I have spoken it, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Hmun palailênga chun tlûng i tih, ka hril ta sih a; Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

en: And I will send a fire on Magog, and on them that dwell securely in the isles; and they shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Magog le thlierkâra chêngtuhai chunga chun mei tir ka ta; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.

en: And my holy name will I make known in the midst of my people Israel; neither will I suffer my holy name to be profaned any more: and the nations shall know that I am Jehovah, the Holy One in Israel.
hmr: Chun, ka hming inthieng chu ka mi Israelhai laia chun suklangsâr ka ta, ka hming inthieng sukpawrchea a um ding hrim hrim chu ngai thei naw ningah, chun, hnamhai chun LALPA, Israela Mi Inthieng chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.

en: Behold, it cometh, and it shall be done, saith the Lord Jehovah; this is the day whereof I have spoken.
hmr: Ngai ta, a hung tlung mêk a nih, thaw a ni ngei ding a nih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih; hi hi a nih ni ka ihril chu.

en: And they that dwell in the cities of Israel shall go forth, and shall make fires of the weapons and burn them, both the shields and the bucklers, the bows and the arrows, and the handstaves, and the spears, and they shall make fires of them seven years;
hmr: Chun, chuong Israel khawpui- haia chêngtuhai chu fe suok an ta, hriemhrei meihai chu siem an ta, râwng an tih; âwmphaw le phawhai dâm, thalngul le thalhai dâm, hmawl- funghai dâm, feihai dâm, râwng an ta, chun, chuonghai chun kum sari sûng mei chu tîng an tih;

en: so that they shall take no wood out of the field, neither cut down any out of the forests; for they shall make fires of the weapons; and they shall plunder those that plundered them, and rob those that robbed them, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: chuongchun, rama inthawkin thing la naw ni hai a, rampui hnuoia inthawkin pakhat khawm phûr bawk naw ni hai; hriemhreihaiin mei an ti ding a ni sih a; anni suksetuhai chu suksieng an ta, anni inruhmangtuhai chu inruhmang an tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

en: And it shall come to pass in that day, that I will give unto Gog a place for burial in Israel, the valley of them that pass through on the east of the sea; and it shall stop them that pass through: and there shall they bury Gog and all his multitude; and they shall call it The valley of Hamon-gog.
hmr: “Chun, chu nia chun, Israela chun, tuisuoriet saktieng panga fethlengtuhai phairuom chu Gog ta ding chun inphûmna hmun dingin pêng ka ta; chutaka chun Gog le a mihai po po chu phûm an tih; chun, anni chun ‘Hamon-gog Phairuom’ ti nghe nghêng an tih.

en: And seven months shall the house of Israel be burying them, that they may cleanse the land.
hmr: Chun, ram chu an sukthieng theina dingin Israel sûngkuohai chun anni chu thla sari sûng phûm an ta.

en: Yea, all the people of the land shall bury them; and it shall be to them a renown in the day that I shall be glorified, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Anih, chu rama mihai po po chun phûm an ta, chawimawia ka um nia chun anni ta ding chun hriet zing tlâk nîng a tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

en: And they shall set apart men of continual employment, that shall pass through the land, and, with them that pass through, those that bury them that remain upon the face of the land, to cleanse it: after the end of seven months shall they search.
hmr: Chun, ram chu sukfai dinga ram fang suok a, ruong phûm loa umhai phûm dinga sina nei ding mi ruot hran an ta, anni chun thla sari tâwpah zawng ṭan an tih.

en: And they that pass through the land shall pass through; and when any seeth a man’s bone, then shall he set up a sign by it, till the buriers have buried it in the valley of Hamon-gog.
hmr: Chun, chuong ram fangtuhai chun fang an ta, mi tukhawma mi- hriem ru a hmu chun, a sira chun inchikna târ a ta, a phûmtuhaiin Harmon-gog phairuoma an phûm hmakhat chun.

en: And Hamonah shall also be the name of a city. Thus shall they cleanse the land.
hmr: (Chutaka chun khawpui a hming Hamona khawm a um bawk a.) Chuong ang chun ram chu suk- thieng an tih.

en: And thou, son of man, thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Speak unto the birds of every sort, and to every beast of the field, Assemble yourselves, and come; gather yourselves on every side to my sacrifice that I do sacrifice for you, even a great sacrifice upon the mountains of Israel, that ye may eat flesh and drink blood.
hmr: “Chun, nang mihriem naupa, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; ramhnuoia sa tinrêng le, vate chi tinrênghai kuoma chun thu hril la, hieng hin hril rawh: Hung inkhâwm unla, hung ro, sa chu in fâka thisen chu in dâwn theina dingin Israel tlâng chunghaia inthâwina ropui- tak, in ta dinga kân thâwina, kân thâwina sîr tina inthawkin hung inkhâwm ro.

en: Ye shall eat the flesh of the mighty, and drink the blood of the princes of the earth, of rams, of lambs, and of goats, of bullocks, all of them fatlings of Bashan.
hmr: Mi thilthawtheihai sa chu fâng in ta; hnuoia lalhai le, berâmchalhai le, berâmtehai le, kêlhai le, bâwng- chalhai, Basan rama châwmthâuhai po po thisen chu dâwn in tih.

en: And ye shall eat fat till ye be full, and drink blood till ye be drunken, of my sacrifice which I have sacrificed for you.
hmr: In ta dinga kân thâwina thâu chu in khawp hmakhat fâng in ta, thisen chu in inrui hmakhat dâwn bawk in tih.

en: And ye shall be filled at my table with horses and chariots, with mighty men, and with all men of war, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, ka dâwkâna chun sa- kawrhai, sakawr tawlailîrhai, mi thilthawtheitakhai le indo mihai po po chun sukkhawpin um in tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

en: And I will set my glory among the nations; and all the nations shall see my judgment that I have executed, and my hand that I have laid upon them.
hmr: Chun, ka ropuina chu hnamhai laia chun sieng ka ta, chuongchun, hnam po pohai chun rorêlna ka suk- tlung ta le, an chunga ka kut kân nghat chu hmûng an tih.

en: So the house of Israel shall know that I am Jehovah their God, from that day and forward.
hmr: Chun, chu nia inthawka a hnungtieng chen chun Israel sûngkuo chun LALPA an Pathien ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.

en: And the nations shall know that the house of Israel went into captivity for their iniquity; because they trespassed against me, and I hid my face from them: so I gave them into the hand of their adversaries, and they fell all of them by the sword.
hmr: Chun, hnamhai chun Israel sûngkuo chu an suol leia sala intâng an nih ti hrieng an ta; ka chungah an lo bawsiet tah a, kei khawma ka hmai ka thuppêk bawk leiin; chuongchun, an hmêlmahai kutah anni chu ka pêk a, an rêng el chun kâwlhnâma chun an lo tlu tah a.

en: According to their uncleanness and according to their transgressions did I unto them; and I hid my face from them.
hmr: An inthieng nawna ang pei le, an bawisietnahai ang peiin an chunga chun ka lo thaw tah a; chun, ka hmai chu ka thuppêk bawk a.

en: Therefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Now will I bring back the captivity of Jacob, and have mercy upon the whole house of Israel; and I will be jealous for my holy name.
hmr: “Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Tuhin Jakob sal intângna chu hung la kîr ka ta; Israel sûngkuo pumpui ta ding chun zângaina nei ka tih; chun, ka hming inthieng khawm humhal bawk ka tih.

en: And they shall bear their shame, and all their trespasses whereby they have trespassed against me, when they shall dwell securely in their land, and none shall make them afraid;
hmr: An rama chun himtakin an chêng a, tukhawma anni chu an sukṭi naw pha chun, an inzakna, an baw- sietnahai po po, ka chunga an lo bawsietnahai chu phur an tih;

en: when I have brought them back from the peoples, and gathered them out of their enemies’ lands, and am sanctified in them in the sight of many nations.
hmr: hnamhai laia inthawka anni ka hung ṭhuoi kîr nâwk a, an hmêlmahai rama inthawka anni ka kei khâwma, hnam tamtakhai mithmua annia chawimawia ka um pha chun.

en: And they shall know that I am Jehovah their God, in that I caused them to go into captivity among the nations, and have gathered them unto their own land; and I will leave none of them any more there;
hmr: Chun, hnamhai laia sala intâng dinga kân fetir a, anni rama ngei chun ka ṭhuoi khâwm nâwka hin, LALPA an Pathien chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an ta; chutaka chun anni chu tukhawm mâksan nâwk ta naw ningah,

en: neither will I hide my face any more from them; for I have poured out my Spirit upon the house of Israel, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: annia inthawk chun ka hmai chu thuppêk ta bawk naw ning a; Israel sûngkaw chunga chun ka thla- rau ka buok ta sih a, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih,” tiin.

en: Thou also, son of man, take thee a tile, and lay it before thee, and portray upon it a city, even Jerusalem:
hmr: “Nang khawma, mihriem naupa, ṭêklei phêk la la, a chunga chun khawpui, Jerusalem khawpui lim chu inngîr la;

en: and lay siege against it, and build forts against it, and cast up a mound against it; set camps also against it, and plant battering rams against it round about.
hmr: chu chu rûn la, kulhaiin bâwl khum la, a vêla chun hnuoi dêng pâwng la, puon inhai kei khum bawk la, chun, a vêl el chun kâphmunhai siem bawk rawh.

en: And take thou unto thee an iron pan, and set it for a wall of iron between thee and the city: and set thy face toward it, and it shall be besieged, and thou shalt lay siege against it. This shall be a sign to the house of Israel.
hmr: Chun, thîr phêk la la, nang le khawpui inkâra chun bang dingin intung la, chun, i hmai chu chu tieng chu hei innghat la, inhuol angin siem la, chun, nangin inhuol rawh. Hi hi Israel sûngkaw inchikna chu nîng a tih.

en: Moreover lie thou upon thy left side, and lay the iniquity of the house of Israel upon it; according to the number of the days that thou shalt lie upon it, thou shalt bear their iniquity.
hmr: “Chu nawa chun, i vawitieng delin zâl la, i chunga chun Israel sûngkaw suolna chu innghat rawh; chu chu chunga i zâl ni zât ang pei chun, an suolna chu phur i tih.

en: For I have appointed the years of their iniquity to be unto thee a number of days, even three hundred and ninety days: so shalt thou bear the iniquity of the house of Israel.
hmr: An suol kum zât chu i ta ding chun i ni dingin, ni za thum le sâwm- kuo ni dingin ka ruot ta sih a, chuong- chun, Israel sûngkaw suolna chu i phur ding a nih.

en: And again, when thou hast accomplished these, thou shalt lie on thy right side, and shalt bear the iniquity of the house of Judah: forty days, each day for a year, have I appointed it unto thee.
hmr: Chun, hi hi i thaw vawng pha chun, i changtieng pang delin zâl nâwk i ta; Juda sûngkaw suolna chu phur thung tâng i tih; ni sâwmli sûng, ni tin chu kum khata dingin, i ta dingin hieng ang hin ka ruot ta sih a.

en: And thou shalt set thy face toward the siege of Jerusalem, with thine arm uncovered; and thou shalt prophesy against it.
hmr: Jerusalem rûna um tieng chu i hmai innghat i ta, i bânhai hlîmin, chun, a chungthua chun hrillâwk i tih.

en: And, behold, I lay bands upon thee, and thou shalt not turn thee from one side to the other, till thou hast accomplished the days of thy siege.
hmr: Chun, ngai ta, khuopnahai i chungah sieng ka ta, i rûnna nihai chu i sukkim hmakhat chun sîr khat sîr khatah în her nawna dingin.

en: Take thou also unto thee wheat, and barley, and beans, and lentils, and millet, and spelt, and put them in one vessel, and make thee bread thereof; according to the number of the days that thou shalt lie upon thy side, even three hundred and ninety days, shalt thou eat thereof.
hmr: Bu le, buṭei le bê le, si le, butun le, havai la la, bêl pakhatah sie la; chutaka inthawk chun bei siem rawh; a sîra i zâl ni zât ang peiin; chu chu ni za thum le sâwmkuo sûng fâng i tih.

en: And thy food which thou shalt eat shall be by weight, twenty shekels a day: from time to time shalt thou eat it.
hmr: Chun, i bu i fâk ding chu a bûka bûk nîng a ta, ni tina shekel sâwm- hni; hunbi nei takin i fâk chau ding a nih.

en: And thou shalt drink water by measure, the sixth part of a hin: from time to time shalt thou drink.
hmr: chun, tui khawm inkhi bawkin dâwn i ta, hin hmun ruka ṭhea hmun khat pei, a hunbi nei takin dâwn i tih.

en: And thou shalt eat it as barley cakes, and thou shalt bake it in their sight with dung that cometh out of man.
hmr: Chun, an mithmua chun mi- hriem êk leh meiah em i ta, buṭei bei angin fâng i tih,” tiin.

en: And Jehovah said, Even thus shall the children of Israel eat their bread unclean, among the nations whither I will drive them.
hmr: Chun, LALPA chun, “Chuong ang bawk chun Israel thlahai chun anni ka hnawt hmangna ding hnamhai kuoma chun an bei chu inthieng loin fâng an tih,” a ta.

en: Then said I, Ah Lord Jehovah! behold, my soul hath not been polluted; for from my youth up even till now have I not eaten of that which dieth of itself, or is torn of beasts; neither came there abominable flesh into my mouth.
hmr: Chun, kei chun, “A, Lalpa PATHIEN! ngai ta, kei chu ka lungril khawm sukpawrche a la ni nawh a, ka tleirâwla inthawk tah tu chen hin amaa thi amanih, ramsahaiin an kei nâwi amanih ka fâk ngai nawh a, ka baua hin sa tirdakum hrim hrim a lût ngai nawh,” ka tih a.

en: Then he said unto me, See, I have given thee cow’s dung for man’s dung, and thou shalt prepare thy bread thereon.
hmr: Chun, ka kuoma chun, “En ta, hi mihriem êk aiah bâwng êk ka pêk cheh a, chuongchun, i bei chu i buotsai ding a nih,” a ta.

en: Moreover he said unto me, Son of man, behold, I will break the staff of bread in Jerusalem: and they shall eat bread by weight, and with fearfulness; and they shall drink water by measure, and in dismay:
hmr: Chu nawa chun, ka kuoma chun, “Mihriem naupa, ngai ta, beia Jerusalem châwmna chu suktâwp ka ta, bei chu inkhia inkhiin fâng an ta, fîmkhurtak elin; chun, tui khawm maktitakin, inkhia inkhiin dâwn bawk an tih;

en: that they may want bread and water, and be dismayed one with another, and pine away in their iniquity.
hmr: bei le tui chu an tlâksama, anni le anni chu mak an inti senga, an suolnaa chu lâk hmang an ni theina dingin.

en: In the five and twentieth year of our captivity, in the beginning of the year, in the tenth day of the month, in the fourteenth year after that the city was smitten, in the selfsame day, the hand of Jehovah was upon me, and he brought me thither.
hmr: Kan sal intâng kum sâwmhni panga kum, chu kum kum ṭantir, chu thla ni sâwm ni, khawpui chu suksieta a um hnung kum sâwm pali kum, chu ni le le chun LALPA kut chu ka chungah a um a, chung- tienga chun a mi ṭhuoi tah a.

en: In the visions of God brought he me into the land of Israel, and set me down upon a very high mountain, whereon was as it were the frame of a city on the south.
hmr: Pathien thil hmulâwknaa chun Israel ramah a mi ṭhuoi a, tlâng insângtak, a simtienga chun khawpui riruong chu a um a, chutaka chun a mîn ṭhum tah a.

en: And he brought me thither; and, behold, there was a man, whose appearance was like the appearance of brass, with a line of flax in his hand, and a measuring reed; and he stood in the gate.
hmr: Chun, chu tieng chun a mi ṭhuoi a, chun, ngai ta, mi pakhat, a hmêl- put dân chu dârsen ang, a kuta ziza hruol le, inkhina luonghmawl chawi a um a; dâi kawtkhâra chun ama chu a ngîr a.

en: And the man said unto me, Son of man, behold with thine eyes, and hear with thine ears, and set thy heart upon all that I shall show thee; for, to the intent that I may show them unto thee, art thou brought hither: declare all that thou seest to the house of Israel.
hmr: Chu mi chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, i mithai khan en la, i nahai khan lo ngai bawk la, ka în hmutir dinghai che po po chunga chun i lungril sie rawh; i kuoma kân hmutir theina ding chea hi tienga hung ṭhuoi i ni hrim a; chuongchun, i hmuhai po po chu Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun puong rawh,” a tih a.

en: And, behold, a wall on the outside of the house round about, and in the man’s hand a measuring reed six cubits long, of a cubit and a handbreadth each: so he measured the thickness of the building, one reed; and the height, one reed.
hmr: Chun, ngai ta, in puotienga chun bang chu a vêlin a um a; chu mipa kuta inkhina luonghmawl chu tawng ruka sei a na, tawng khat le kut- phabawk seng a nih; chun, a in sa tieng chu ân khi a, luonghmawl khat a na; ân sâng tieng khawm chu luong- hmawl khat bawk.

en: Then came he unto the gate which looketh toward the east, and went up the steps thereof: and he measured the threshold of the gate, one reed broad; and the other threshold, one reed broad.
hmr: Chun, saktieng ngha dâi kawt- khâra chun a hung a, chutaka kai- lâwnhaia chun a hang feh a; dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk chu ân khih a, luonghmawl khat a na, tuolpûk dang khawm chu luonghmawl khat bawk a nih.

en: And every lodge was one reed long, and one reed broad; and the space between the lodges was five cubits; and the threshold of the gate by the porch of the gate toward the house was one reed.
hmr: Chun, vêngna pindan tinhai chu luonghmawl khata sei, luonghmawl khata lien a nih; vêngna pindan inkâr chu tawng nga a na; dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk chu, a in tieng panga tuol- pûka chun luonghmawl khat a nih.

en: He measured also the porch of the gate toward the house, one reed.
hmr: In tieng panga a dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk khawm chu ân khih a, tawng riet a nih.

en: Then measured he the porch of the gate, eight cubits; and the posts thereof, two cubits; and the porch of the gate was toward the house.
hmr: Chun, dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk chu ân khi a, tawng riet a nih, chun, kawtkhâr bieng chu tawng hni; chun, a dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk chu in tieng panga chun a um a.

en: And the lodges of the gate eastward were three on this side, and three on that side; they three were of one measure: and the posts had one measure on this side and on that side.
hmr: Chun, dâi kawtkhâr vêngna pindanhai chu, saktieng hi tieng panga chun pathum a na; pathum chu intie seng an na; chun, a kawtkhâr bienghai khawm chu hi tieng le saw tienga chu intie an nih.

en: And he measured the breadth of the opening of the gate, ten cubits; and the length of the gate, thirteen cubits;
hmr: Chun, a kawtkhâr kawt lien khangtieng chu ân khi a, tawng sâwm a na; a kawtkhâr seizie chu tawng sâwmpathum;

en: and a border before the lodges, one cubit on this side, and a border, one cubit on that side; and the lodges, six cubits on this side, and six cubits on that side.
hmr: chun, vêngna pindan hmaa a rei sîr chu hi tieng sîrah tawng khat, khing tieng sîra chun tawng khat bawk; chun, vêngna pindanhai chu hi tieng sîra chun tawng ruk, khing tieng sîra chun tawng ruk bawk.

en: And he measured the gate from the roof of the one lodge to the roof of the other, a breadth of five and twenty cubits; door against door.
hmr: Chun, vêngna pindan chunga pakhata inthawkin pindan dang chunga dâi kawtkhâr chu ân khi a; a khang chu tawng sâwmhni panga a na, kawtkhâra inthawka kawtkhâr dang chenin.

en: He made also posts, threescore cubits; and the court reached unto the posts, round about the gate.
hmr: Chun, tuolpûk chu ân khi a, tawng sawmhni a na; huon sûng tuollai dâi kawtkhâr chen chu a tuol zâwl chu a nih.

en: And from the forefront of the gate at the entrance unto the forefront of the inner porch of the gate were fifty cubits.
hmr: Chun, lûtna dâi kawtkhâr tuolthlâka inthawka dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk sûngril lem tuolthlâk chen chu tawng sâwmnga a nih.

en: And there were closed windows to the lodges, and to their posts within the gate round about, and likewise to the arches; and windows were round about inward; and upon each post were palm-trees.
hmr: Dâi kawtkhâr chun a vêlin, pin- dan kêm kawtkhâr bieng tienga chîn inzui pei tukverhai a nei a. Chuong ang bawkin a tuolpûk sûngtieng a vêlin tukverhai an um bawk a, a banhaia chun intûm thing lim a um a.

en: Then brought he me into the outer court; and, lo, there were chambers and a pavement, made for the court round about: thirty chambers were upon the pavement.
hmr: Chun, huon sûng tuollai puo lema chun a mi ṭhuoi a, chun, ngai ta, pindanhai le lungpha, a vêla huon sûng tuollai dinga an siem chu a um a; lungpha chunga chun pindan sâwmthum a um a.

en: And the pavement was by the side of the gates, answerable unto the length of the gates, even the lower pavement.
hmr: Lungpha chu dâi kawtkhârhai sîra chun a um a, dâi kawtkhârhai le inchen chie, lungpha hnuoihnung lem chu a nih.

en: Then he measured the breadth from the forefront of the lower gate unto the forefront of the inner court without, a hundred cubits, both on the east and on the north.
hmr: Chun, dâi kawtkhâr hnuoi- hnung lema tuolthlâka inthawka, a huon sûng tuollai sûngril lem tuol- thlâk khangtieng chu ân khi a, a saktieng a le a hmârtieng chun tawng za khat ve ve a nih.

en: And the gate of the outer court whose prospect is toward the north, he measured the length thereof and the breadth thereof.
hmr: Chun, a huon sûng tuollai puo lem dâi kawtkhâr, hmârtienga ngha chu, a chu dungtieng le chu khang- tieng chu ân khi a.

en: And the lodges thereof were three on this side and three on that side; and the posts thereof and the arches thereof were after the measure of the first gate: the length thereof was fifty cubits, and the breadth five and twenty cubits.
hmr: Chun, vêngna pindanhai chu hi tieng sîrah pathum, khingtieng sîrah pathum bawk a nih; chun, a kawt- khâr bienghai le a tuolpûkhai chu a dâi kawtkhâr pakhatna tie seng chu a na; a dung tieng chu tawng sâwmnga a na, a khang tieng chu tawng sâwm- hni panga.

en: And the windows thereof, and the arches thereof, and the palm-trees thereof, were after the measure of the gate whose prospect is toward the east; and they went up unto it by seven steps; and the arches thereof were before them.
hmr: A tukverhai le, a tuolpûk le, chutaka intûm thinghai chu, sak- tieng panga ngha dâi kawtkhâra mi tie seng kha an nih; chun, sirbi pa- sariin a hang tlung a, chun, tuolpûk chu sûngtienga chun a um a.

en: And there was a gate to the inner court over against the other gate, both on the north and on the east; and he measured from gate to gate a hundred cubits.
hmr: Chun, dâi kawtkhâr dang zâwn- a chun, tuollai sûng sûngril lema dinga dâi kawtkhârhai a um a; sak- tieng panga le hmârtieng panga chun dâi kawtkhâra inthawka dâi kawt- khâr chen chun tawng za khatin ân khi a.

en: And he led me toward the south; and, behold, a gate toward the south: and he measured the posts thereof and the arches thereof according to these measures.
hmr: Chun, sim tieng panga chun a mi ṭhuoi a, simtienga dâi kawtkhâr chu ka hmuh a, chuongchun, hi inkhina dân ang pei hin chutaka a kawtkhâr bienghai le a tuolpûkhai chu ân khi a.

en: And there were windows in it and in the arches thereof round about, like those windows: the length was fifty cubits, and the breadth five and twenty cubits.
hmr: Khâng tukverhai ang bawk kha, a keikul haia le chun chu- taka chun tukverhai a um a, a seizie chu tawng sâwmnga a na, a khang tieng chu tawng sâwmhni panga a nih.

en: And there were seven steps to go up to it, and the arches thereof were before them; and it had palm-trees, one on this side, and another on that side, upon the posts thereof.
hmr: Chun, a hang kaina dinga chun sirbi pasari a um a; a tuolpûkhai chu chuonghai hmaa chun a um a; chun, chutaka a kawtkhâr bienghai chunga chun intûm thinghai, hi tiengah pakhat, khing tiengah pakhat bawk a um a.

en: And there was a gate to the inner court toward the south: and he measured from gate to gate toward the south a hundred cubits.
hmr: Chun, simtieng panga chun a huon sûng tuollai sûngril lema dâi kawtkhâr chu a um a; chun, sim- tienga a dâi kawtkhâra inthawka dâi kawtkhâr chu tawng za khatin ân khi a.

en: Then he brought me to the inner court by the south gate: and he measured the south gate according to these measures;
hmr: Chun, simtienga dâi kawtkhâra chun huon sûng tuollai sûngril lema chun a mi ṭhuoi a; hieng inkhina dân hin simtienga dâi kawtkhâr chu ân khih a;

en: and the lodges thereof, and the posts thereof, and the arches thereof, according to these measures: and there were windows in it and in the arches thereof round about; it was fifty cubits long, and five and twenty cubits broad.
hmr: hieng inkhina dân ang hin a vêngna pindanhai, kawtkhâr bieng- hai le tuolpûkhai chu ân khih a; chun, a vêlin a tuolpûkhai le chun tukver- hai a um a; tawng sâwmngaa sei, tawng sâwmhni pangaa lien a nih.

en: And there were arches round about, five and twenty cubits long, and five cubits broad.
hmr: Chun, a vêlin tuolpûkhai tawng sâwmhni pangaa sei, tawng ngaa lien a um a.
