en: And by the border of Simeon, from the east side unto the west side, Issachar, one portion.
hmr: Simeon ramria, saktieng panga inthawka thlangtieng pang chenah, Issakar, chan khat.

en: And by the border of Issachar, from the east side unto the west side, Zebulun, one portion.
hmr: Issakar ramria, saktienga in- thawka thlangtieng pang chenah, Zebulun, chan khat.

en: And by the border of Zebulun, from the east side unto the west side, Gad, one portion.
hmr: Zebulun ramria, saktieng panga inthawka thlangtieng pang chenah, Gad chan khat.

en: And by the border of Gad, at the south side southward, the border shall be even from Tamar unto the waters of Meribath-kadesh, to the brook of Egypt, unto the great sea.
hmr: Gad ramriah, sim khâw zâwnga simtiengah, a ramri chu Tamar-a inthawka Meribath-kades tuihai chen, Aigupta vadungtê chen, tuisuo- riet lien chen chun nîng a tih.

en: This is the land which ye shall divide by lot unto the tribes of Israel for inheritance, and these are their several portions, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Hi hi Israel hnamhai kuoma aisâna rochan dinga i sem ding ram a nih; chun, hienghai hi an hmun hran hran tamtakhai chu a nih; Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

en: And these are the egresses of the city: On the north side four thousand and five hundred reeds by measure;
hmr: Chun, hienghai hi khawpuia inthawka suoknahai chu an nih; hmâr tieng panga chun, inkhia tawng sâng li za nga a na;

en: and the gates of the city shall be after the names of the tribes of Israel, three gates northward: the gate of Reuben, one; the gate of Judah, one; the gate of Levi, one.
hmr: chun, khawpui dâi kawtkhâr chu Israel hnamhai hming ang pei nîng a ta, hmârtieng panga chun dâi kawtkhâr pathum: Reuben dâi kawt- khâr, pakhat; Juda dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat; Levi dâi kawtkhâr pakhat;

en: And at the east side four thousand and five hundred reeds, and three gates: even the gate of Joseph, one; the gate of Benjamin, one; the gate of Dan, one.
hmr: chun, saktieng panga khawm chun tawng sâng li za nga bawk nîng a ta, chun, dâi kawtkhâr pathum; Josef dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat; Benja- min dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat; Dan dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat;

en: And at the south side four thousand and five hundred reeds by measure, and three gates: the gate of Simeon, one; the gate of Issachar, one; the gate of Zebulun, one.
hmr: simtieng panga chun inkhia tawng sâng li za nga nîng a ta; dâi kawtkhâr pathum: Simeon dâi kawt- khâr, pakhat; Issakar dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat; Zebulun dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat;

en: At the west side four thousand and five hundred reeds, with their three gates: the gate of Gad, one; the gate of Asher, one; the gate of Naphtali, one.
hmr: thlangtieng panga chun tawng sâng li za nga bawk nîng a ta, dâi kawtkhâr pathum leh; Gad dâi kawt- khâr, pakhat, Aser dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat; Naphtali dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat.

en: It shall be eighteen thousand reeds round about: and the name of the city from that day shall be, Jehovah is there.
hmr: A vêl chun tawng sîng khat sâng riet nîng a ta; chu khawpui hming chu chu nia inthawk chun, “Jehova Samma nîng a tih,” tiin.

en: And thou, son of man, take thee a sharp sword; as a barber’s razor shalt thou take it unto thee, and shalt cause it to pass upon thy head and upon thy beard: then take thee balances to weigh, and divide the hair.
hmr: “Chun, nang mihriem naupa, kâwlhnâm ngei la la, luvâwtu hmulvâw chem angah hmang la, i lu le i khâkhmul invâw rawh; chun, bûknain bûk la, sam chu ṭhe rawh.

en: A third part shalt thou burn in the fire in the midst of the city, when the days of the siege are fulfilled; and thou shalt take a third part, and smite with the sword round about it; and a third part thou shalt scatter to the wind, and I will draw out a sword after them.
hmr: Khawpui lailunga chun a hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu meiah râwng i ta, chu pha chun khawpui rûnna chu suktlung nîng a ta; a hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat dang chu lâng i ta, a vêlin kâwlhnâmin sât nawi i ta; chun a hmun thuma ṭhe a hmun khat dang chu thliah vawr dar i ta, chu hnunga chun keiin kâwlhnâm kei- dawk ka tih.

en: And thou shalt take thereof a few in number, and bind them in thy skirts.
hmr: Chun, chutaka inthawk chun tlâwmterek lâng i ta, i puon hmawrah inbâwk i ta.

en: And of these again shalt thou take, and cast them into the midst of the fire, and burn them in the fire; therefrom shall a fire come forth into all the house of Israel.
hmr: Chu chu la nâwk i ta, meiah peilût i tih; meia chun râwng i tih; chun, chutaka inthawk chun Israel in po pohaia chun mei hung suok a tih,” a tih a.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: This is Jerusalem; I have set her in the midst of the nations, and countries are round about her.
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng ang hin a ti a nih: “Hi hi Jerusalem chu a nih, hnamhai laia chun ka sie tah a, ramhai chu a vêlin an um a.

en: And she hath rebelled against mine ordinances in doing wickedness more than the nations, and against my statutes more than the countries that are round about her; for they have rejected mine ordinances, and as for my statutes, they have not walked in them.
hmr: Hnamhai nêka rîtlona thawin ka rorêl chunga chun a hel tah a; ram a vêla umhai nêkin ka thuruot chunga chun a hel ta bawk a; ka rorêlhai chu an inkîra, ka thuruothai chu zâwm khawm an zâwm nuom nawh.

en: Therefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Because ye are turbulent more than the nations that are round about you, and have not walked in my statutes, neither have kept mine ordinances, neither have done after the ordinances of the nations that are round about you;
hmr: Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih: In vêla hnam umhai nêkin in buoi ngun lem a, ka thuruothai in zâwm bawk nawh a, ka rorêlhai in pawm bawk nawh a, in vêla hnamhai dân ang chun in thaw bawk naw leiin;

en: therefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Behold, I, even I, am against thee; and I will execute judgments in the midst of thee in the sight of the nations.
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng ang hin a tih: Ngai ta u, kei hin, kei ngei hin ka dodâl cheu a nih; hnamhai mithmua ngei chun nangmaa chun rorêlna chu ka hung tirsuok ding a nih.

en: And I will do in thee that which I have not done, and whereunto I will not do any more the like, because of all thine abominations.
hmr: Chun, ka la thaw ngai hlek lo chu nangmaa chun thâwng ka ta, i tir- dakumna lei chun, chuong ang hrim hrim chu thaw khawm thaw nâwk ta ngai naw ningah.

en: Therefore the fathers shall eat the sons in the midst of thee, and the sons shall eat their fathers; and I will execute judgments on thee; and the whole remnant of thee will I scatter unto all the winds.
hmr: Chuongchun, i sûnga chun pa- hai chun naupahai chu fâng an ta, naupahai chun an pahai chu fa bawk an tih; chun, nangmaa chun rorêl chu hung sukthlûng ka ta, nangmaa la mahlahai po po khawm chu thedar vawng ka tih.

en: Wherefore, as I live, saith the Lord Jehovah, surely, because thou hast defiled my sanctuary with all thy detestable things, and with all thine abominations, therefore will I also diminish thee; neither shall mine eye spare, and I also will have no pity.
hmr: Chuleiin, ka hring zing angin, i tirdakumna po po le i thilpawrchehai po po chun ka hmun inthieng chu i lo sukpawrche tâk leiin hung sukriral ngei ngei ka ti che a, ka mit khawma hla naw ni cheh a, kei khawma lunginsietna nei bawk naw ning che.

en: A third part of thee shall die with the pestilence, and with famine shall they be consumed in the midst of thee; and a third part shall fall by the sword round about thee; and a third part I will scatter unto all the winds, and will draw out a sword after them.
hmr: Nanga hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu hripuiin thîng an ta, i sûnga chun ṭâmnaa fâkzoin um an tih; chun, hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu i vêla chun kâwlhnâmah tlûng an ta; chun, a hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat dang chu the dar ka ta, an hnunga chun kâwlhnâm keidawk ka tih.

en: Thus shall mine anger be accomplished, and I will cause my wrath toward them to rest, and I shall be comforted: and they shall know that I, Jehovah, have spoken in my zeal, when I have accomplished my wrath upon them.
hmr: “Chuongchun, ka lunginsenna chu sukpuitling ni tâng a ta, ka lung inthakna chu an chunga chun suktlai tâng ka ta, inhawi ti tâng ka tih; chun, an chunga ka lung inthakna ka sukpuitling pha chun kei LALPA hin ṭhahnemngaia ka lo hril a ni ti hre tâng an tih.

en: Moreover I will make thee a desolation and a reproach among the nations that are round about thee, in the sight of all that pass by.
hmr: Chu nawa khawm chun, i vêla hnamhaia le, nang hung fe khêltu- hai po po che mithmua chun râusana le mi ṭawngdawngah siem ka ti cheh a.

en: So it shall be a reproach and a taunt, an instruction and an astonishment, unto the nations that are round about thee, when I shall execute judgments on thee in anger and in wrath, and in wrathful rebukes (I, Jehovah, have spoken it);
hmr: Chuongchun, vauna ṭiumhai le, lunginthak le lunginsennaa rorêlna- hai ka hung suktlung pha chun, i vêla hnam umhai ta ding chun makti ding le, inchûkna ding le, hrânghla le, invaunaa hmang la nîng a tih, kei LALPA hin ka hril tah a nih:

en: when I shall send upon them the evil arrows of famine, that are for destruction, which I will send to destroy you. And I will increase the famine upon you, and will break your staff of bread;
hmr: chu pha chun, an chunga chun ṭâmna thal ṭha nawhai chu sukbo- hmangna dingin, anni sukbohmang- na dinga ka hung tir ding chu, hung tir ka ta, beia in ringsan khawm chu suktliek ka ta;

en: and I will send upon you famine and evil beasts, and they shall bereave thee; and pestilence and blood shall pass through thee; and I will bring the sword upon thee: I, Jehovah, have spoken it.
hmr: in chunga chun ramsa ṭha naw- hai le ṭâmhai hung tir ka ta; nau insûntir an ti cheu; chun, hripuihai le thisen chu nangmaa chun fe thleng a ta; i chunga chun kâwlhnâm ka hung lâk suok ding a nih; kei, LALPAIN ka hril ta a ni hi,” tiin.

en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a,

en: Son of man, set thy face toward the mountains of Israel, and prophesy unto them,
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, i hmai kha Israel tlâng tiengahai sawn innghat la, an kuomah thu hril la,

en: and say, Ye mountains of Israel, hear the word of the Lord Jehovah: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah to the mountains and to the hills, to the watercourses and to the valleys: Behold, I, even I, will bring a sword upon you, and I will destroy your high places.
hmr: ‘Nangni Israel tlânghai, Lalpa PATHIEN thu chu lo ngai ta u, Lalpa PATHIEN chun tlânghai le muol- hai le, tui luongnahai le, phairuom- hai kuoma chun hieng ang hin a tih; Ngai ta u, keiin, keima ngeiin, in chungah kâwlhnâm intlungtir ka ta, in bâwlhmunhai sukse vawng ka tih.

en: And your altars shall become desolate, and your sun-images shall be broken; and I will cast down your slain men before your idols.
hmr: In mâichâmhai chu râusan hung nîng an ta, in nisa milimhai khawm chu suktliek nîng a ta, in mi thathai chu in milimhai hmaa chun hung pei thlâng ka tih.

en: And I will lay the dead bodies of the children of Israel before their idols; and I will scatter your bones round about your altars.
hmr: Chun, Israel thlahai thiruonghai chu an milimhai hmaa chun sieng ka ta; in ruhai chu in mâichâmhai vêla chun the dar ka tih.

en: In all your dwelling-places the cities shall be laid waste, and the high places shall be desolate; that your altars may be laid waste and made desolate, and your idols may be broken and cease, and your sun-images may be hewn down, and your works may be abolished.
hmr: In chêngna hmunhaia po po chun khawpuihai chu suksiet nîng an ta, bâwlhmunhai chu râusan nîng an ta; in mâichâmhai chu râusan le suksiet a ni theina ding le in milimhai chu suktliek le suktâwp a nia, in nisa- milimhai chu phûr thlûk a na, in sinthawhai chu suktâwp a ni theina dingin.

en: And the slain shall fall in the midst of you, and ye shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, thata umhai chu nangni lai ngei tlûng an ta, chun, LALPA ka ni mi hre tâng in tih.

en: Yet will I leave a remnant, in that ye shall have some that escape the sword among the nations, when ye shall be scattered through the countries.
hmr: Amiruokchu, ṭhenkhat la hlâng ka ta, ramhaia sukdara in um pha chun, hnamhai laia chun ṭhen- khat chun kâwlhnâm chu pumpel in tih.

en: And those of you that escape shall remember me among the nations whither they shall be carried captive, how that I have been broken with their lewd heart, which hath departed from me, and with their eyes, which play the harlot after their idols: and they shall loathe themselves in their own sight for the evils which they have committed in all their abominations.
hmr: Chun, nangni laia chuonga suok- hai chun, hnamhai sala ṭhuoia an umnahai laia an um lai chun mi hre zing an ta, an lungril keimaa in- thawka ṭhea um tah, châkna chu ka lo sukkawi ta zie hai le, an mithai an milimhai châktaka an enna le chun; chun, anni an tirdakumna po poa an lo thaw tah, thil ṭha naw ta ding chun an mithmu ngeia chun intirdak an tih.

en: And they shall know that I am Jehovah: I have not said in vain that I would do this evil unto them.
hmr: Chun, LALPA ka ni ti hrieng an ta; an kuomah hieng thil ṭha naw hi ka thaw ding a nih ka ti hi a mei meia hril ka ni nawh ti hre bawk an tih,’” tiin.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Smite with thy hand, and stamp with thy foot, and say, Alas! because of all the evil abominations of the house of Israel; for they shall fall by the sword, by the famine, and by the pestilence.
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih, “I kut ben la, i kein sir la, chun, Ehei! Israel sûngkaw tirdakumna suol po po lei chun, kâwlhnâma le, ṭâmnaa le hripuiah an tlu ding a ni sih a, ti rawh.

en: He that is far off shall die of the pestilence; and he that is near shall fall by the sword; and he that remaineth and is besieged shall die by the famine: thus will I accomplish my wrath upon them.
hmr: Hlataka umhai chu hripuiin thîng an ta; a hnaia umhai chu kâwl- hnâmah tlûng an ta, chun, umhmuna uma inhuol khuma um chu ṭâmin thîng a tih: chuong ang chun ka lungsenna chu an chunga chun ka sukpuitling ding a nih.

en: And ye shall know that I am Jehovah, when their slain men shall be among their idols round about their altars, upon every high hill, on all the tops of the mountains, and under every green tree, and under every thick oak, the places where they offered sweet savor to all their idols.
hmr: Chun, an mi thathai chu an mâichâm vêla an milimhai laia a um a, muol insâng tina dâm, tlâng sâng sîp tinahai dâm, thing hring tin hnuoiahai dâm, thingsaisuo lien hnuoi tinahai dâm, an milimhai kuoma riminhnik an inhlânnahai po poa chun an um pha chun LALPA ka ni ti mi hre tâng an tih.

en: And I will stretch out my hand upon them, and make the land desolate and waste, from the wilderness toward Diblah, throughout all their habitations: and they shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, an chunga chun ka kut chu inlet ka ta, thlalêra inthawka Dibla tieng, an hluona sûng po po chu, ram chu râusana siemin suk- sieng ka tih; chun, LALPA chu ka ni ti mi hre tâng an tih,” tiin.

en: Moreover the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chu nawa khawm, LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a,

en: And thou, son of man, thus saith the Lord Jehovah unto the land of Israel, An end: the end is come upon the four corners of the land.
hmr: “Nang mihriem naupa, Israel ram kuoma chun Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng ang hin a tih; Tâwpna, tâwpna chu ram kil lia inthawkin a hung tlung tah.

en: Now is the end upon thee, and I will send mine anger upon thee, and will judge thee according to thy ways; and I will bring upon thee all thine abominations.
hmr: Tuhin tâwpna chu i kuoma chun a um a, i chunga chun ka lunginsenna chu ka hung tir ding a nih; i um- dânhai ang peiin i chungthu rêl ka ta, i tirdakumnahai leiin hrem ka ti che.

en: And mine eye shall not spare thee, neither will I have pity; but I will bring thy ways upon thee, and thine abominations shall be in the midst of thee: and ye shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Ka mit chun hla naw ni che a, lunginsietna khawm nei naw ning che; nisienlakhawm, i um dânhai leiin hrem ka ti che, i tirdakumna chu nangmaah a um si a; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng i tih.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: An evil, an only evil; behold, it cometh.
hmr: “Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Thil ṭha naw, ṭha naw tak meu; en ta a hung a nih.

en: An end is come, the end is come; it awaketh against thee; behold, it cometh.
hmr: Tâwpna a hung tlung a, tâwpna chu a hung tlung tah; i chunga chun a hung tho a, ngai ta, a hung a nih.

en: Thy doom is come unto thee, O inhabitant of the land: the time is come, the day is near, a day of tumult, and not of joyful shouting, upon the mountains.
hmr: Aw ram hluotu, i chungrikna chu a hung tlung tah; a hun chu a hung tlung a, a ni chu a hnai tah, tlâng chunghaia hlimna khêk rihai ni loin, buoina ni chu.

en: Now will I shortly pour out my wrath upon thee, and accomplish mine anger against thee, and will judge thee according to thy ways; and I will bring upon thee all thine abominations.
hmr: Tuhin sâwt nawteah ka lung- insenna chu i chungah hung bun- thlâng ka ta, i chunga ka lunginsenna chu sukpuitling ka tih; i um dânhai ang peiin i chungah ro rêl ka ta, i tirdakumnahai po po leiin hrem ka ti che.

en: And mine eye shall not spare, neither will I have pity: I will bring upon thee according to thy ways; and thine abominations shall be in the midst of thee; and ye shall know that I, Jehovah, do smite.
hmr: Ka mit chun hla naw ni, lunginsietna nei bawk naw ning; i um dânhai ang peiin i chungah hung intlungtir ka ta; i tirdakumnahai chu nangmaah a um si a; chun, kei LALPA hin ka hrem che a nih ti hre tâng i tih.

en: Behold, the day, behold, it cometh: thy doom is gone forth; the rod hath blossomed, pride hath budded.
hmr: Ngai ta, ni chu, ngai ta, a hung tlung; i chungrikna chu a fe suok tah a, hmawl chu ân dâwn a, chapona chu a kumûm tah.

en: Violence is risen up into a rod of wickedness; none of them shall remain, nor of their multitude, nor of their wealth: neither shall there be eminency among them.
hmr: Thawluinaa inthawkin rîtlona hmawl a hung suok a, a tu el khawm um sawng thei naw nih a, an mipuihai khawm, an hausaknahai khawm; anni lai chun a ṭhabik ti khawm um naw nih.

en: The time is come, the day draweth near: let not the buyer rejoice, nor the seller mourn; for wrath is upon all the multitude thereof.
hmr: A hun chu a hung tlung a, a ni chu a hung hnai tah; inchawtu chu hlim naw sienla, a zawrtu khawma pawiti bawk naw raw se; mi po po chungah lunginsenna chu a um si a.

en: For the seller shall not return to that which is sold, although they be yet alive: for the vision is touching the whole multitude thereof, none shall return; neither shall any strengthen himself in the iniquity of his life.
hmr: An dam zing sûng chun, a zawrtu chu zawra um tah kuoma chun a kîr nâwk âwm si nawh a; hi thilhmulâwk hin mipui po po a huom vawng a; tukhawm kir nâwk naw ni a, tukhawm ama suolnaa chun dam muolsuo naw nih.

en: They have blown the trumpet, and have made all ready; but none goeth to the battle; for my wrath is upon all the multitude thereof.
hmr: Tawtawrâwt chu an mût tah a, mi po po chu an inringtir vawng tah a; nisienlakhawm, tukhawm indonaa chun an fe nawh a; ka lunginsenna chu mipui po po chunga chun a um sih a.

en: The sword is without, and the pestilence and the famine within: he that is in the field shall die with the sword; and he that is in the city, famine and pestilence shall devour him.
hmr: “Kâwlhnâm chu puotieng a um a, ṭâmna le hripui chu sungtienga chun a um a; loa um chu kâwlhnâmah thîng a ta, khawpui sûnga um chu hripui le ṭâmna chun fa zo a tih.

en: But those of them that escape shall escape, and shall be on the mountains like doves of the valleys, all of them moaning, every one in his iniquity.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, chutaka lo suokthleng chu suokthleng an ta, vaṭhu angin tlângahai chun um an ta, an rêng el chun sûn an tih, mi tinin mâni suolna seng chu.

en: All hands shall be feeble, and all knees shall be weak as water.
hmr: Kuthai po po chu hrât loin um an ta, khûphai po po chu tui anga zawiin um an tih.

en: They shall also gird themselves with sackcloth, and horror shall cover them; and shame shall be upon all faces, and baldness upon all their heads.
hmr: Saiip puonhaiin inchei an ta, ṭitnain anni chu inkhum a tih; an hmaihai chunga chun inzakna um a ta, an luhai po po chunga chun lu- kâwkna um a tih.

en: They shall cast their silver in the streets, and their gold shall be as an unclean thing; their silver and their gold shall not be able to deliver them in the day of the wrath of Jehovah: they shall not satisfy their souls, neither fill their bowels; because it hath been the stumblingblock of their iniquity.
hmr: An tangkahai chu kawtthlêr- haia chun dehâwn an ta, an râng- kachakhai khawm chu thil thieng naw ang hung nîng a tih; an tangka le rângkachak chun LALPA lungin- senna nia chun anni chu sansuok naw nih a; an lungril chu suktlaiin, an phîng khawm chu sukkhawp bawk naw ni hai, an suolnaa tlûkna lung a ni tâk leiin.

en: As for the beauty of his ornament, he set it in majesty; but they made the images of their abominations and their detestable things therein: therefore have I made it unto them as an unclean thing.
hmr: An incheina mawina chu inlal- saknân an hmang a; nisienlakhawm, an tirdakumna limhai chu an siemin, an pawrchena thilhai limhai le chun; chuleiin, an ta ding chun thil thieng- nawah ka siem tah a nih.

en: And I will give it into the hands of the strangers for a prey, and to the wicked of the earth for a spoil; and they shall profane it.
hmr: Man dingin ramdang mihai kut- ah pêng ka ta, mi rilohai kuomah râllâk dingin; chuongchun, sukpawr- chêng an tih.

en: My face will I turn also from them, and they shall profane my secret place; and robbers shall enter into it, and profane it.
hmr: Ka hmai chu an kuoma in- thawkin la hmang ka ta, ka hmun inthieng chu sukpawrchêng an tih; inru hmanghai chu a sûngah lût an ta, sukpawrchêng an tih;

en: Make the chain; for the land is full of bloody crimes, and the city is full of violence.
hmr: Khaidiet chu siem rawh; ram chu thisen insuo thusiein a sip a, khawpui sûng chu inpâwngnêknain a sip sih a.

en: Wherefore I will bring the worst of the nations, and they shall possess their houses: I will also make the pride of the strong to cease; and their holy places shall be profaned.
hmr: Chuleichun, awi naw mi ṭha nawtakhai chu hung ṭhuoi ka ta, an inhai chu neipêk an tih; mi hrâthai chapona chu suktâwp bawk ka ta; chun, an hmun inthienghai chu sukpawrche nîng an tih.

en: Destruction cometh; and they shall seek peace, and there shall be none.
hmr: Bohmangna chu a hung tlung mêk a, inremna chu zawng an tih; anachu um naw ni.

en: Mischief shall come upon mischief, and rumor shall be upon rumor; and they shall seek a vision of the prophet; but the law shall perish from the priest, and counsel from the elders.
hmr: Sietna chunga siet nâwk zuolna hung tlung a ta, thuthang chunga chun thuthang um a ta; chun, zâwlnei thilhmulâwkhai chu zawng an ta, nisienlakhawm, thiempua inthawkin dân le, mi hluihaia inthawkin thu- râwn chu bohmang tâng a tih.

en: The king shall mourn, and the prince shall be clothed with desolation, and the hands of the people of the land shall be troubled: I will do unto them after their way, and according to their deserts will I judge them; and they shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Lal chu lusûnin um a ta, hotu khawm chu beidawngnain inthuom a tih; chun, rama mipuihai kuthai chu sukbuoi nîng a ta; an um dânhai ang peiin an chungah thâwng ka tih; chun, an ngaithana ang peiin rorêl- pêk ka ta; chun, LALPA ka ni ti mi hre tâng an tih,” tiin.

en: And it came to pass in the sixth year, in the sixth month, in the fifth day of the month, as I sat in my house, and the elders of Judah sat before me, that the hand of the Lord Jehovah fell there upon me.
hmr: Chun, kum ruknaa thla ruknaa, chu thla ni nga ni chun, ka ina chun ka ṭhung a, ka hmaa chun Juda upahai an ṭhung laiin, Lalpa PATHIEN kut chu chutaka chun ka chunga chun a um tah a.

en: Then I beheld, and, lo, a likeness as the appearance of fire; from the appearance of his loins and downward, fire; and from his loins and upward, as the appearance of brightness, as it were glowing metal.
hmr: Chun, ka en a, mei inlang anga inlang hi ka hmuh a; a kâwng le hnuoitieng inlang dân chu mei a na, a kâwng le a chungtieng inlang dân chu var ang, ṭhihna zie ang a na.

en: And he put forth the form of a hand, and took me by a lock of my head; and the Spirit lifted me up between earth and heaven, and brought me in the visions of God to Jerusalem, to the door of the gate of the inner court that looketh toward the north; where was the seat of the image of jealousy, which provoketh to jealousy.
hmr: Chun, kut ang tak hi a hang ban suok a, ka samtawma chun a mi man a, chuongchun, thlarau chun vân le hnuoi kâra chun a mi dawm kâng a, Pathien thil hmulâwknahai chun Jerusalemah, tuolsûng sûngril lem dâi kawtkhâr hmâr tieng sawnga chun a mi ṭhuoi tah a; chutaka chun îtthîkna milim, îtthîk dinga chawk- tho hlaktu ṭhungpha chu a um a.

en: And, behold, the glory of the God of Israel was there, according to the appearance that I saw in the plain.
hmr: Chun, ngai ta, chutaka chun phaia ka hmu ta ang tak khan, Israel Pathien ropuina chu a um a.

en: Then said he unto me, Son of man, lift up thine eyes now the way toward the north. So I lifted up mine eyes the way toward the north, and behold, northward of the gate of the altar this image of jealousy in the entry.
hmr: Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, i mit khan hmâr tieng hang en rawh,” a mi tih a. Chuongchun, hmâr tieng ka mit chun ka hei en a, mâichâm kawtkhâr hmâr tieng panga chun a lûtnaah îtthîkna milim chu ka hmuh a.

en: And he said unto me, Son of man, seest thou what they do? even the great abominations that the house of Israel do commit here, that I should go far off from my sanctuary? But thou shalt again see yet other great abominations.
hmr: Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, an ithaw saw i hmu am? Hitaka hin Israel sûngkuo chun tirdakumna nasatak el an lo thaw tah a, ka hmun inthienga inthawka hlataka ka fe hmang hielna dingin; amiruokchu, tirdakumna nasa nâwk zuol chu i la hmu ding a nih,” a tih a.

en: And he brought me to the door of the court; and when I looked, behold, a hole in the wall.
hmr: Chun, tuolsûng tuollai kawt- khâra chun a mi ṭhuoi a; chun, ka hei en chun, banga chun âwng ka hmu tah a.

en: Then said he unto me, Son of man, dig now in the wall: and when I had digged in the wall, behold, a door.
hmr: Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, tuhin bang kha hang ker rawh,” a ta. Chun, bang ka hei ker chun, kawtkhâr ka hmuh a.

en: And he said unto me, Go in, and see the wicked abominations that they do here.
hmr: Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Va lût la, hitaka tirdakumna suoltak an thaw chu va en rawh,” a ta.

en: So I went in and saw; and behold, every form of creeping things, and abominable beasts, and all the idols of the house of Israel, portrayed upon the wall round about.
hmr: Chuongchun, ka va lût a, ka va en a, ngai ta, thilhring bawka invâk chi tinrênghai, ramsa tirdakumhai le, Israel sûngkuo milimhai po po chu bang chunga chun a vêla limziekin ka hmuh a.

en: And there stood before them seventy men of the elders of the house of Israel; and in the midst of them stood Jaazaniah the son of Shaphan, every man with his censer in his hand; and the odor of the cloud of incense went up.
hmr: An hmaa chun Israel sûngkuoa upahai sâwmsari an ngîr a, anni laia chun Saphan naupa Jaazania chu a ngîr a, mi tin chun an kutah rimin- hnik râwna thlêng an chawi seng a; chuongchun, riminhnik khu rim chu a hang feh a.

en: Then said he unto me, Son of man, hast thou seen what the elders of the house of Israel do in the dark, every man in his chambers of imagery? for they say, Jehovah seeth us not; Jehovah hath forsaken the land.
hmr: Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, mi tin mâni milim pindan chitah, Israel sûngkaw upa- hai chun inthim hnuoia chun ieng am an thawh a, i hmu am? Anni chun, ‘LALPA chun a mi hmu nawh, LALPA chun hnuoi hi a nghatsan tah,’ an tih a,” tiin.

en: He said also unto me, Thou shalt again see yet other great abominations which they do.
hmr: Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Tirdak- umna an thaw nasatak dang khawm la hmûng i tih,” a ti bawk a.

en: Then he brought me to the door of the gate of Jehovah’s house which was toward the north; and behold, there sat the women weeping for Tammuz.
hmr: Chun, LALPA in dâi kawtkhâr hmârtienga uma chun a mi ṭhuoi a; chun, ngai ta, chutaka chun nuhmeihai Tammuz ṭain an lo ṭhung a.

en: Then said he unto me, Hast thou seen this, O son of man? thou shalt again see yet greater abominations than these.
hmr: Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Aw mihriem naupa, hi hi i hmu am? Hieng nêka tirdakumna nasa lem la hmu nâwk i tih,” a ta.

en: And he brought me into the inner court of Jehovah’s house; and behold, at the door of the temple of Jehovah, between the porch and the altar, were about five and twenty men, with their backs toward the temple of Jehovah, and their faces toward the east; and they were worshipping the sun toward the east.
hmr: Chun, LALPA in tuollai sûngril lema chun a mi ṭhuoi tah a, chun, ngai ta, LALPA biekin kawtkhâr, mâichâm le a tuolpûk inkâra chun mi sâwmhni panga, LALPA biekin chu an hnungtieng innghata, an hmai- hai chu khawsak tieng nghain an um a; saktienga nisa chu chibai an bûk a.

en: Then he said unto me, Hast thou seen this, O son of man? Is it a light thing to the house of Judah that they commit the abominations which they commit here? for they have filled the land with violence, and have turned again to provoke me to anger: and, lo, they put the branch to their nose.
hmr: Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Aw mihriem naupa, hi hi i hmu am? Tirdakumna hitaka an lo thaw ta hi, Juda sûngkaw ta ding chun thil chîn tham am a nih? Ram chu inpâwngnêknain an suksip a, lung- insen dingin an mi chawktho nâwk a, en ta, an hnârah sâwlhna an sie a.

en: Therefore will I also deal in wrath; mine eye shall not spare, neither will I have pity; and though they cry in mine ears with a loud voice, yet will I not hear them.
hmr: Chuleiin, kei khawma lungin- senin thaw vêng ka ta, ka mitin anni chu hla naw nih a, lunginsietna nei bawk naw ning; ka naa chun râwl inringtakin hung khêk hai sien- khawm, anni chu lo ngai naw ning,” tiin.

en: Then he cried in mine ears with a loud voice, saying, Cause ye them that have charge over the city to draw near, every man with his destroying weapon in his hand.
hmr: Chun, râwl inringtakin ka naa chun a hung khêk a, “Mi tinin mâni suksietna hriemhrei a kuta chawiin, khawpui enkawltuhai chu hung inhnaitir rawh,” a ta.

en: And behold, six men came from the way of the upper gate, which lieth toward the north, every man with his slaughter weapon in his hand; and one man in the midst of them clothed in linen, with a writer’s inkhorn by his side. And they went in, and stood beside the brazen altar.
hmr: Chun, ngai ta, hmârtienga um, dâi kawtkhâr chunghnung lema chun mi paruk, mi tinin mâni sukhlumna hriemhrei chu kuta chawiin an hung a; anni laia pakhat chu puon zai inhmiin ân chei a, a kâwngah lekhaziektu lekhatui bûr a pai a. Chun, anni chu an va lût a, dârsen mâichâm bula chun an ngîr tah a.

en: And the glory of the God of Israel was gone up from the cherub, whereupon it was, to the threshold of the house: and he called to the man clothed in linen, who had the writer’s inkhorn by his side.
hmr: Chun, Israel Pathien ropuina chu, a umna hmuna inthawk chun in kawtkhâr bula chun a hang feh a; chun, mi puon zai inhmia inchei a, a kâwnga lekhaziektu lekhatuibûr neitu chu a ko tah a.

en: And Jehovah said unto him, Go through the midst of the city, through the midst of Jerusalem, and set a mark upon the foreheads of the men that sigh and that cry over all the abominations that are done in the midst thereof.
hmr: Chun, LALPA chun a kuoma chun, “Khawpui laia chun, Jerusalem laia chun fe suok la, chu sûnga tirdak- umnahai thawa um tahai po po leia khêk a, thuokdawnghai mi chuonghai bâwkhaia chun inchikna sie rawh,” a tih a.

en: And to the others he said in my hearing, Go ye through the city after him, and smite: let not your eye spare, neither have ye pity;
hmr: Chun, mi dang kuoma khawm keia hrieta chun, “Ama hnunga chun khawpui chu va fang la, va sukhlum rawh; i mitin hla naw sienla, lungin- sietna nei bawk naw rawh;

en: slay utterly the old man, the young man and the virgin, and little children and women; but come not near any man upon whom is the mark: and begin at my sanctuary. Then they began at the old men that were before the house.
hmr: putarhai, tlangvâlhai, nunghâk- hai, naupangtêhai, nuhmeihai chu that fairêt rawh; amiruokchu, mi a chunga inchikna um chu hung hnai naw la; chun, ka hmun inthienga chun ṭan rawh,” tiin. Chun, biekin tuola um mi upahaia chun an ṭan tah a.

en: And he said unto them, Defile the house, and fill the courts with the slain: go ye forth. And they went forth, and smote in the city.
hmr: Chun, an kuoma chun, “In chu sukpawrche unla, tuollaihai chu mi thathai chun suksip ro; fe ro le,” a ta, chun, an fe suok a, khawpuia chun an that tah a.

en: And it came to pass, while they were smiting, and I was left, that I fell upon my face, and cried, and said, Ah Lord Jehovah! wilt thou destroy all the residue of Israel in thy pouring out of thy wrath upon Jerusalem?
hmr: Chun, an that zing lai chun keia khâta mâksanin ka um a, ka hmaia hnuoi sikin ka bawkkhup a, ka khêk a, “A, Lalpa PATHIEN! Jerusalem chunga i lunginsenna i bunthlâka hin Israel la um sunhai po po chu i suk- bohmang vawng ding am a nih?” ka tih a.

en: Then said he unto me, The iniquity of the house of Israel and Judah is exceeding great, and the land is full of blood, and the city full of wresting of judgment: for they say, Jehovah hath forsaken the land, and Jehovah seeth not.
hmr: Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Juda le Israel sûngkaw suolna chu a nasa êm êm a, ram chu thisenin a sip a, khawpui sûng chu rorêlna pawisak nawnain a sip a, ‘LALPA chun ram hi a nghatsan tah a, LALPA chun a hmu nawh,’ an ti sih a.

en: And as for me also, mine eye shall not spare, neither will I have pity, but I will bring their way upon their head.
hmr: Chuongchun, keia ta ding khawma, ka mitin hla naw nih a, lunginsietna nei bawk naw ning, ami- ruokchu, an suol man chu an lu chungah innghat lem ka tih,” a ta.

en: And, behold, the man clothed in linen, who had the inkhorn by his side, reported the matter, saying, I have done as thou hast commanded me.
hmr: Chun, ngai ta, mi puon zai in- hmia inchei a, a kâwnga lekhatuibûr neitu khan thu chu a hung hrilsâwng a, “Nangin thu i mi pêk ang tak khan ka thaw tah,” tiin.
